T02TD1677E:257a-1: shr'i sarba buddha sa ma yo gi mandala s'a dha na kra ma n'a ma /
T02TD1677E:257a-3: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1677E:257a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1677E:257a-5: ma 'gags rnam 'phrul ye shes chen po'i 'od //
T02TD1677E:257a-6: zab cing rgya che gsung dbyangs sna tshogs sgrogs //
T02TD1677E:257a-7: yon tan rgyan gyis chos 'phrul mdzad mthar phyin //
T02TD1677E:257a-8: rigs drug lha mo'i tshogs bcas rgyal gyur cig / theg chen gsang ba'i lam mchog gsal mdzad pa'i //
T02TD1677E:257a-9: sangs rgyas gnyis pas nges pa'i dgongs mdzad 'gro la //
T02TD1677E:257a-10: 'khor 'das ma spangs las grol rgyal chen po //
T02TD1677E:257a-11: rim bzhin brgyud pa'i dam pa rnams la 'dud //
T02TD1677E:257a-12: rgyud mchog sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang mdzod las ;
T02TD1677E:257a-13: dkyil 'khor chen po'i las kyi rim pa dag / legs bsdus rnam 'grel sogs kyis gsal byas kyang //
T02TD1677E:257a-14: phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub thabs gsal ma bstan //
T02TD1677E:257a-15: dam pas ma 'ongs rnams la brtser dgongs phyir //
T02TD1677E:257a-16: sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag mdor bsdus te //
T02TD1677E:257a-17: rgya mtsho rgya chen bdud rtsi thigs pa'i tshul //
T02TD1677E:257a-18: yang dag sgrub don yan lag phyogs gcig bshad //
T02TD1677E:257a-19: dam pa'i gsung dang rgyud la mi bsten cing //
T02TD1677E:257a-20: dgos 'brel yan lag 'thad pa'i sgrub med par //
T02TD1677E:257a-21: rang dgar smyos tshig khva bzhin smra byed pa //
T02TD1677E:257a-22: gsang don smos phyir log 'dren gtso bor grags //
T02TD1677E:257a-23: dgongs pa'i rim pas sgrub don ma bshad kyang //
T02TD1677E:257a-24: tshogs pas las rgyas myur ba'i cho ga yis //
T02TD1677E:257a-25: brten pa'i stobs kyis dus mtshungs grol byed pa //
T02TD1677E:257a-26: khyad par thabs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bstan bshad //
T02TD1677E:257a-27: rgyal ba rnams kyis dgongs mdzad ji bzhin pa'i //
T02TD1677E:257b-0: yang dag sgrub pa'i @257b bsnyen sgrub cho ga las //
T02TD1677E:257b-1: dang po rten gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis //
T02TD1677E:257b-2: sgrub pa chen po'i las la 'jug par bya //
T02TD1677E:257b-3: de dag ji bzhin legs par spyod pa'i mthus //
T02TD1677E:257b-4: tshe 'di las dang dngos grub phun tshogs gnas //
T02TD1677E:257b-5: rig 'dzin gnas thob sangs rgyas sar 'gro zhing //
T02TD1677E:257b-6: zag med yon tan phrin las go bar ston //
T02TD1677E:257b-7: gang zhig rgyal ba rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa dag gis ni nges pa'i don du bshad pa'i theg pa dag kyang phyag rgya bzhi dang tshad mas bsgrubs te bla ma brgyud pa la brten par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:257b-8: de la dang po rten gyi mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD1677E:257b-9: zhi zhing des la gsong por smra ba dang //
T02TD1677E:257b-10: sgyu sogs med pas gzhan don brtson pa dang //
T02TD1677E:257b-11: nga rgyal khro gtum dang bral zhing //
T02TD1677E:257b-13: dam pa'i bshes gnyen la brten te skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02TD1677E:257b-14: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1677E:257b-15: sdom pa blang pa dag bya'o //
T02TD1677E:257b-16: de nas theg pa chen po la mos pa'i thugs kyis dad pa dang //
T02TD1677E:257b-18: yang dag pa'i lta bas shes rab gsum bskyed cing snod kyi dri ma dag bsal bar byas nas rdo rje theg pa la mos pas de nyid kyi bla ma dam pa la brten te dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang /
T02TD1677E:257b-19: dbang bzhi rim pa bzhin du thob par bya ba dang //
T02TD1677E:257b-20: de dag gi dam tshig ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gnas pas 'gro ba thams cad bsgral zhing byang chub kyi lam la dgod par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje theg pa las bshad pa'i don bzhin du bdag bsgral bar bya ste /
T02TD1677E:257b-21: dad pa la skyo dub med pa dang /
T02TD1677E:257b-22: brtson 'grus la thang lhod med pa dang /
T02TD1677E:257b-23: lta ba la dbye gsal med pa dang /
T02TD1677E:257b-24: spyod pa la 'gron theb med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar dam bcas te /
T02TD1677E:257b-25: bsgrub pa rim pa'i gdams ngag mnos shing lta ba'i mtshan nyid dang //
T02TD1677E:257b-28: sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dag the tshom med par nyams su blang ngo //
T02TD1677E:257b-29: des bdag dang gzhan dag rjes su gzung ba'i phyir gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bya ba'i cho ga dang /
T02TD1677E:257b-30: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin shes shing bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1677E:257b-31: phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi shas pas rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02TD1677E:257b-32: sngags rnam pa bzhis dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang /
T02TD1677E:257b-33: ye shes kyi lha la sogs pa rnams dgug pa dang /
T02TD1677E:258a-0: mchod pa gsum gyi rim pa shes pas lha @258a * //
T02TD1677E:258a-1: dang slob dpon mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02TD1677E:258a-2: las sna tshogs kyi bya ba la sbyor ba'i cho ga dang /
T02TD1677E:258a-3: bdag dang gzhan la sogs ba ma lus pa rnams gang 'dod pa dag bsrung ba'i cho ga dang /
T02TD1677E:258a-4: slar bsdu ba'i cho ga dang /
T02TD1677E:258a-5: gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga rnams la mkhas shing byang bar byas nas bdud rtsi lnga'i ril bu bca' zhing bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:258a-6: de yang rdo rje rgyal po dang /
T02TD1677E:258a-7: rgyal theb kyi ma zin par gyur nas /
T02TD1677E:258a-8: gnas shar dang byang du gzhol zhing phyogs gzhan mtho bar gyur pa nags tshal phun sum tshogs par 'khor dang /
T02TD1677E:258a-10: yo byad dang rgyan chas dag phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas las la sbyar ro //
T02TD1677E:258a-11: de la gnas ni rnal 'byor pa dag shin tu nyams dga' bar gyur pa'i sa gzhi padma 'dra ba las dbus mtho zhing nam mkha' 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ltar mngon pa /
T02TD1677E:258a-12: shar dang byang du gzhol zhing phyogs gzhan mtho bar gyur pa nags tshal bzang po me tog dang 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis brgyan cing /
T02TD1677E:258a-13: chu rgyun gsal bas mtha' bzhi rgyas pa'i ri'am /
T02TD1677E:258a-14: ljongs sam thang la sogs pa rin po che dang sman 'bras kyis brgyan pa ni shin tu bkra shis par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1677E:258a-15: de las gzhan pa'i las phra mo dag sgrub pa la ni rigs so so'i gnas dang mthun par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:258a-16: der shis pa dang mi shis pa'i ltas brtag pa'i phyir sa pus nub tsam du brkos la slar sa des dgong ba'am dri chu bzang po dang sbyar bas bkang ste /
T02TD1677E:258a-17: mnyam par gzhag pas rdo rje dril bu gzung zhing rang gi sngags brjod nas mi drag par gom pa brgya'i gnas nas log ste blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:258a-18: de las ma legs pa'i mtshan ma mthong ba dag la ni g-yas g-yon gyi gnas su spo bar bya zhing /
T02TD1677E:258a-19: pra se na la sog pas brtag go //
T02TD1677E:258a-20: de nas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis snod dag par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1677E:258a-21: sku'i rten gzugs pa dang gsung gi sgra bsgrags pa dang /
T02TD1677E:258a-22: mchod sbyin chen po rgya cher gtang zhing /
T02TD1677E:258a-23: gtor ma'i tshogs kyis mgron rnams tshim par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:258a-24: de nas yang rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgya'am /
T02TD1677E:258a-25: ye shes kyi phyag rgyas kyang brtags nas shin tu dge bar gyur ba der sa bslang bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:258a-26: gal te mtshan ma ngan pa lta bu zhig na ni zhi ba dang drag pos gdul bar bya zhing de dag gi sbyin sreg la sogs pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1677E:258b-0: @258b yul gyi bdag po rgyal po la sogs pa dag la ni bslang ba'am /
T02TD1677E:258b-2: mi snang ba la ni rang gi lha'i sbyor bas gtor ma btang ste /
T02TD1677E:258b-3: mgron rnams tshim nas las la bsgo zhing de las khyad par du sa'i lha mo dang /
T02TD1677E:258b-4: sa bdag ta pa la'i 'khor rnams la bslangs nas de dag mnyes par bya'o//
T02TD1677E:258b-5: de nas sa gzhi de dag tu dri chab byin gyis brlabs pa sngags kyis gtor zhing /
T02TD1677E:258b-6: ting nge 'dzin gsal ba'i 'phro 'dus bdud rtsi dang /
T02TD1677E:258b-7: yi ge gsum gyis spyang pa byas nas dkyil 'khor ji tsam 'dod pa'i rgyar sa gzhi brkos te /
T02TD1677E:258b-8: dngos grub rab 'bring gi don du //
T02TD1677E:258b-11: sor bzhi'i tshad tsam du brkos pa'i tshad 'phang du brtsig par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:258b-12: de'i dus su rus pa dang /
T02TD1677E:258b-16: sa ro rnams bsal te dri zhim pa'i chu dang /
T02TD1677E:258b-17: sa mnyen 'jam pa sbyin po dang bsres nas brtsigs te /
T02TD1677E:258b-20: dri rnams snying po ru gzhug go //
T02TD1677E:258b-21: yang chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i don bsam zhing /
T02TD1677E:258b-22: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shudhonyaham zhes brjod de /
T02TD1677E:258b-24: de nas mchod gtor sna tshogs nye bar spyang zhing //
T02TD1677E:258b-25: rigs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa lngas rang nyid rgyan gyis brgyan te /
T02TD1677E:258b-26: sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa'i don du /
T02TD1677E:258b-28: zhes brjod cing nam mkha' stong pa'i rang bzhin las 'byung ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ri rab dang bcas pa brtan par gnas shing /
T02TD1677E:258b-31: gur la me 'od dang bcas par bsam mo //
T02TD1677E:258b-32: de nas sgrub pa po dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa la phyogs bzhi /
T02TD1677E:258b-33: de'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni /
T02TD1677E:258b-34: sna tshogs rdo rje bcings pa sa la bzhag ste /
T02TD1677E:258b-35: aom me de ni badzri bhya ba badzra bandha h'um zhes pa'o //
T02TD1677E:258b-36: de nas bdag nyid kyi mdun du sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo bum pa 'dzin pa bka' nyan pa'i tshul du gnas pa las zhal bsil dang mchod yon phul zhing gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:258b-37: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1677E:258b-38: spyod pa'i chul dang khyad par gyi //
T02TD1677E:258b-39: sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang //
T02TD1677E:258b-40: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02TD1677E:258b-41: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02TD1677E:258b-42: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //
T02TD1677E:258b-43: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni //
T02TD1677E:259a-2: zhes lan gsum gsol ba btab nas //
T02TD1677E:259a-3: ji srid las ma grub pa'i bar du bzhugs su gsol ba dang /
T02TD1677E:259a-4: lha mo dgyes nas mdangs phyung ste slar smras pa /
T02TD1677E:259a-5: khyed rnams dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub par gyis shig ces brjod bar bsam mo //
T02TD1677E:259a-6: de nas sgrub pa po dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa la phyogs bzhi'i rnal 'byor ba rgyan gyis brgyan zhing /
T02TD1677E:259a-7: lha mo bzhi'i nga rgyal dang bcas pas gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD1677E:259a-8: aom byams chen nam mkha'i rigs sbyor ba /
T02TD1677E:259a-10: rnam 'byed gsal ba'i chos mchog can //
T02TD1677E:259a-11: yang dag ye shes spyod pa grol //
T02TD1677E:259a-12: aa la la la la ho //
T02TD1677E:259a-13: aom snying rje'i gnas mchog dag pa'i dngos //
T02TD1677E:259a-14: mnyam nyid chos kun 'byung ba yi //
T02TD1677E:259a-15: yon tan rin chen mdzod ston pa'i //
T02TD1677E:259a-16: rnam 'phrul chos las rab tu grol //
T02TD1677E:259a-17: aa la la la la ho //
T02TD1677E:259a-18: aom dga' ba'i padmo mtshan ldan pa //
T02TD1677E:259a-19: kun rtog dngos gsal chags pa med //
T02TD1677E:259a-20: rdo rje gsang gsum gnas gdon pa'i //
T02TD1677E:259a-22: aa la la la la ho //
T02TD1677E:259a-23: aom btang snyoms gnas ngan dra ba sel //
T02TD1677E:259a-24: phrin las bdag po stobs rdzogs pa //
T02TD1677E:259a-25: bya ba'i ye shes mthar mdzad cing //
T02TD1677E:259a-26: sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol //
T02TD1677E:259a-27: aa la la la la ho //
T02TD1677E:259a-28: aom sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02TD1677E:259a-30: sdig pa thams cad las grol zhing //
T02TD1677E:259a-31: bsod nams dngos grub kun 'byung ba'i //
T02TD1677E:259a-32: rgyal ba kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog / mthong dga' mthong bas grol byed pa //
T02TD1677E:259a-33: lam mchog gsang ba chen po'i tshogs //
T02TD1677E:259a-34: bdag nyid chen pos bstan du gsol //
T02TD1677E:259a-35: aa la la la la ho //
T02TD1677E:259a-37: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las khro bo rta mchog rol pa'i skur bsgom zhing phyogs bcur bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis gnas te /
T02TD1677E:259a-38: mig g-yas par ma las byung ba'i nyi ma'i mes thams cad bsreg pa dang /
T02TD1677E:259a-39: mig g-yon par aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i chus dag pa dang /
T02TD1677E:259b-0: sna'i rtse mor yam las byung ba'i rlung gis thams cad 'thor zhing phyag gis @259b mtshon cha khrol nas spro ba mdzad do //
T02TD1677E:259b-2: h'um lha klu gnod sbyin 'byung po dang //
T02TD1677E:259b-3: dri za srin po sha za'i tshogs //
T02TD1677E:259b-4: gshin rje ma mo mkha' 'gro gdug / gnod byed drag po ma lus rnams //
T02TD1677E:259b-5: gang dag sa gzhi 'dir gnas pa //
T02TD1677E:259b-6: srung byed pa yi bdag po'i bka' ;
T02TD1677E:259b-7: / thos pa tsam gyis myur du dengs //
T02TD1677E:259b-8: nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed //
T02TD1677E:259b-9: gang zhig gnas pa'i mthu bo che //
T02TD1677E:259b-10: rdo rje tho ba kha tv'am gas //
T02TD1677E:259b-11: thal ba'i tshogs bzhin bshig par byed //
T02TD1677E:259b-14: gal te gang gis dam tshig bcag /'dod gsum skyes rnams gsad bya ste /
T02TD1677E:259b-16: zhes lan gsum brjod cing sa gzhi bskor te phyogs skyong bcu dag gnas lngar bsdus te /
T02TD1677E:259b-17: khro bo stobs po che dang sbrin sgra la sogs pa'i phur bus gdab bo //
T02TD1677E:259b-18: aom badzra gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02TD1677E:259b-20: k'i la ya k'i la ya /
T02TD1677E:259b-22: h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dha ro a'a dzny'a pa ya ti /
T02TD1677E:259b-23: k'a ya w'ak tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:259b-26: dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:259b-27: de nas dpal he ru kar bsgom zhing mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dang bcas pa'i stong stabs kyis thams cad bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:259b-28: de nas las kyi rdo rje phyi rol gyis tegs bu la mchod gtor bshams te //
T02TD1677E:259b-29: dkon mchog gsum dbang por bzhag nas /
T02TD1677E:259b-31: brgya byin la sogs pa'i srung ma rnams dgug cing mchod pa dang /
T02TD1677E:259b-32: 'gro ba drug na gnas pa'i lha srin sde brgyad la cha gcig dbul ba dang /
T02TD1677E:259b-33: lan chags kyi bgegs rigs rnams la gtor ma bsngos nas khyad par gyi gtor ma bzhi rgyal po sde bzhi la dbul zhing rten la gzhag ste /
T02TD1677E:259b-34: mnga' gsol zhes phyi mtshams bcad do //
T02TD1677E:259b-35: de nas stegs bu tshad dang ldan pa legs par brtsigs te /
T02TD1677E:259b-36: phyogs bzhir sbyin sreg gi thab khung bzhi dang /
T02TD1677E:259b-37: mtshams su rta mchog lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:260a-0: de nas legs par brtsigs shing byugs nas ba'i rnam pa @260a * //
T02TD1677E:260a-3: sman rnams bsres te byug cing /
T02TD1677E:260a-4: de'i steng du bdud rtsi lnga'i chu byin gyis brlabs pas byug go //
T02TD1677E:260a-5: de nas lha rnams kyi gnas su rig pas thig gdab cing bdud rtsi lngas dbus su thig le gru bzhi pa lha mo nyi shu'i gnas su zlum por byas la /
T02TD1677E:260a-6: de la lha so so'i sngags kyis me tog dgram par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:260a-7: de'i rjes su mchod pa'i tshogs dgram zhing /
T02TD1677E:260a-13: brten pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa dang /
T02TD1677E:260a-14: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pas mnyes par byas nas bstod cing gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD1677E:260a-15: de yang pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te /
T02TD1677E:260a-17: g-yon pas dril bu dkrol zhing tshig 'di brjod do //
T02TD1677E:260a-18: thugs rje chen po bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1677E:260a-19: ma lus sems can don mdzad pa'i //
T02TD1677E:260a-20: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sras dang bcas //
T02TD1677E:260a-21: stobs mchog rgyal chen rnams la bstod //
T02TD1677E:260a-22: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02TD1677E:260a-24: mgon gyur las rnams grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1677E:260a-25: rdo rje gsang ba bdag gis bri //
T02TD1677E:260a-26: brtse bas slob ma rnams phyir dang //
T02TD1677E:260a-27: bdag nyid rnams la mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD1677E:260a-28: bcom ldan khyed la bdag gus te //
T02TD1677E:260a-29: dgyes mdzad 'os par gyur pa lags //
T02TD1677E:260a-30: bdag cag rnams la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1677E:260a-31: bya ba chen po 'khor lo'i phyir //
T02TD1677E:260a-32: 'bras gnas byang chub sems sogs dang //
T02TD1677E:260a-33: gsang sngags gsang ba'i lha nyid dang //
T02TD1677E:260a-35: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rjes dga' ba //
T02TD1677E:260a-36: bstan la dga' ba'i 'gro ba dag / gang dag rdo rje'i spyan ldan pa'i //
T02TD1677E:260a-38: don grub gsang ba bdag gis brtsam //
T02TD1677E:260a-39: rjes su brtse bar nyer dgongs te //
T02TD1677E:260a-40: gnang bar mdzad pa'i 'os lags so //
T02TD1677E:260b-0: zhes lan gsum gsol ba @260b btab nas /
T02TD1677E:260b-1: yang mchod pa cung zad phul te brtan par bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02TD1677E:260b-8: rnal 'byor ba'i tshogs rnams 'tshogs par byas nas de'i rjes la phrin las rnam pa bzhi'am //
T02TD1677E:260b-9: yang na gang dgos pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1677E:260b-10: de nas rnal 'byor pa rnams stan bde ba la gnas te //
T02TD1677E:260b-11: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas lus ngag yid gsum mthu bskyed cing /
T02TD1677E:260b-12: bdag dang 'gro ba spyang ba dang /
T02TD1677E:260b-14: 'phags pa la tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02TD1677E:260b-15: sems can thams cad la tshogs bsags pa rnams bya'o //
T02TD1677E:260b-16: yang rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom zhing lha tshogs rnams spyan drangs la /
T02TD1677E:260b-17: bdud rtsi byis kyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD1677E:260b-18: tshogs kyi mchod pas nyams pa bskang pa dang /
T02TD1677E:260b-19: gang dag dam tshig ma 'dres pa dag ni bsre mnan bya zhing gsar bu dag 'jug pa la ni rigs pa'i dbang lnga dam tshig dang bcas pa sbyin pa yin no //
T02TD1677E:260b-20: de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo'i sbyor bas mtshams kyi las bya ste /
T02TD1677E:260b-21: phur pa dar gyi cod pan can bcu la khro bo chen po bcur bskyed cing ye shes kyi khro bo dgug gzhug gnyis su med par byas nas mchod cing bstod de /
T02TD1677E:260b-22: bzlas brjod rdzogs par phul bas mnyes shing brtan par byas nas phyogs skyong gi gzugs la gdug pa'i sems bab ste gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:260b-23: de nas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1677E:260b-24: rdo rje theg pa'i sgor zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi sgrub pa po dag rgyan chas phyag rgya'i tshogs dang /
T02TD1677E:260b-27: thal bas mtshan cing rdo rje rgyal theb yum dang bcas pas rang gi lha gsal bar byas la /
T02TD1677E:260b-28: thig skud ras sar pa'i rgyu las byung ba sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs nas bkal bar bya ste /
T02TD1677E:260b-29: ring thung ni dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur la /
T02TD1677E:260b-30: sbom phra ni sgo'i nyi sha'i tshad do //
T02TD1677E:260b-31: de ltar kha dog lnga'i dog pa byas nas rin po che'i snod du bzhag ste /
T02TD1677E:261a-0: rigs kyi yi ges lhar bskyed cing sngar kyis byin gyis brlabs nas lha rnams dgug gzhug @261a * //
T02TD1677E:261a-2: mchad cang bstod nas bsgril bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:261a-3: aom d'e pta drishti aam ku sha dza: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02TD1677E:261a-5: dang po shar nas nub tu brkyang ste gdab bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:261a-6: de yang thabs kyi gsang gnas nas /
T02TD1677E:261a-7: shes rab kyi gsang ba'i gnas su drangs te /
T02TD1677E:261a-8: aom a'a:h'um dza dza zhes brjod do //
T02TD1677E:261a-9: stobs mchog dpa' bo dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1677E:261a-10: rdo rje thig gi sgra ldan pas //
T02TD1677E:261a-11: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor legs grub cing //
T02TD1677E:261a-12: 'gro ba'i don la bskul bar mdzad //
T02TD1677E:261a-13: aom ma h'a bo dhi tsittsha sarba satva h'um /
T02TD1677E:261a-15: thig skor dang bcas pas nam mkha' la btab ste /
T02TD1677E:261a-17: gzod sa gzhi la gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:261a-18: de yang dang por shar nas nub tu brkyang ba'i thig go //
T02TD1677E:261a-19: de'i phyogs mtshams tshad pa'i phyir cha bzhir byas te /
T02TD1677E:261a-20: bar mtshams gnyis nas phyed kyi tshad kyis ni lho byang du btsal te /
T02TD1677E:261a-21: der thig gnyis pa btab bo //
T02TD1677E:261a-22: der thig gnyis kyang phyed kyi tshad kyis ngos bzhi'i thig rtse nas tshad pas mtshams kyi zur bzhi dod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1677E:261a-23: de'i rjes la shar dang nub dang byang dang lho'i phyogs bzhi dag dang /
T02TD1677E:261a-25: de las phyogs thig bzhi'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis ni cha bzhi'i tshad du 'gyur te /
T02TD1677E:261a-26: de dag kyang lo ma gtub pa'i thig gis cha chen sum cu rtsa gnyis la cha 'bring dang cha bran so so'i gzhung bzhin dbye zhing /
T02TD1677E:261a-27: de'i 'og ma'i he ru ka dang /
T02TD1677E:261a-28: rdo rje nyi ma la ni cha bran gnyis ma phyes pa'i snam bu'o //
T02TD1677E:261a-30: 'khor yug rnams ni cha bran re re'i tshad kyis 'khor ba'o //
T02TD1677E:261a-31: dur khrod ni cha bran bzhi'i tshad do //
T02TD1677E:261a-32: de ltar thig gi las rdzogs nas //
T02TD1677E:261a-33: ye shes kyi skud pa mchod cing bstod do /
T02TD1677E:261a-35: lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas mig gnyis la nyi zla bsam zhing /
T02TD1677E:261a-36: h'i zhes brjod nas blta ba byas nas /
T02TD1677E:261a-37: rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD1677E:261a-38: aom badzra be ga aa kra ma h'um /
T02TD1677E:261a-39: zhes pas ri mo de gdeg par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:261a-40: de nas phyogs thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas tshig 'dis dag par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:261b-0: aom thams cad rang bzhin rnam 'phrul mchog / dngos med zhi ba 'od ldan @261b gsal ;
T02TD1677E:261b-2: dkyil 'khor dag par byin gyis rlobs //
T02TD1677E:261b-3: mnyam pa'i sngags blo rnam gsal bas //
T02TD1677E:261b-4: nyes pa'i zug rdu dag par 'gyur //
T02TD1677E:261b-5: zhes brjod cing thams cad lha'i rang bzhin du brtag ste /
T02TD1677E:261b-6: des ni cho ga lhag ma dang /
T02TD1677E:261b-7: ma tshang ba kha skong bar byed do ;
T02TD1677E:261b-8: / de nas cha dbye bar bya ste /
T02TD1677E:261b-9: phyi rol gru bzhi bsgo dang bcas pa la //
T02TD1677E:261b-10: rab rim gsum dur khrod kyis brgyan pa //
T02TD1677E:261b-11: dbus su pho brang rim pas phye ba ste //
T02TD1677E:261b-12: dkyil 'khor so so'i dbyibs bzhin du //
T02TD1677E:261b-13: pho brang gi ra ba dang /
T02TD1677E:261b-16: de la tshon gyi cho ga ni /
T02TD1677E:261b-18: tshon rtsi gang yang rung ba dag snod lnga'i nang du blugs te /
T02TD1677E:261b-19: phyogs phyogs su bzhag nas yi ge la sogs pa'i lha'i skur bskyed cing ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bkug ste mchod cing bstod nas rang gi gnas su dgram mo //
T02TD1677E:261b-20: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD1677E:261b-21: dang po tshon gyi go rims ni /
T02TD1677E:261b-27: ljang gu'i rim gyis panytsa re kh'a bris te /
T02TD1677E:261b-28: mchod cing thod pas bkab nas mtshan ma'i ltas brtag go //
T02TD1677E:261b-29: 'di ni chos dbyings rnam par dag / sems can khams ni rang sgrol byed//
T02TD1677E:261b-30: dpal ldan rgyal po che ge mo'i //
T02TD1677E:261b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1677E:261b-32: yang dag bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD1677E:261b-33: dkyil 'khor las rnams shis par mdzod //
T02TD1677E:261b-34: ces brjod cing bteg ste blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:261b-35: de yang thig ni phyi nas gdab cing /
T02TD1677E:261b-36: tshon ni nang nas dgye ste /
T02TD1677E:261b-37: dang po rdo rje rgyal theb kyis bri zhing /
T02TD1677E:261b-38: phyi nas ci bde bar bri ste mtho zhing drang bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:261b-39: gang zhig re kh'a dma' ba dang /
T02TD1677E:261b-42: 'khrul pa dag gis ni mi 'grub bo //
T02TD1677E:261b-43: de ltar tshon rtsi lnga'i mchog dag ni dbus su btab ste /
T02TD1677E:261b-44: kha dog phyogs kyis phye la /
T02TD1677E:261b-45: mu khyud sngon po dag la ni rdo rje dkar po bri'o //
T02TD1677E:261b-46: dkyil 'khor de'i phreng ba dmar po la rtsibs mchan ljang gu dang /
T02TD1677E:261b-48: gzhan dag kyang so so'i rigs kyis shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1677E:261b-49: sgo bzhi ni dkar po dang /
T02TD1677E:261b-53: rta babs ni kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02TD1677E:262a-1: phreng ba ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1677E:262a-2: rdo rje'i ra ba ni sngo la dkar po'i phreng bas mdzes pa'o //
T02TD1677E:262a-3: me ri ni dmar ser ro //
T02TD1677E:262a-4: dur khrod ni phyogs kyi mdog go //
T02TD1677E:262a-6: phyogs skyong ba dang klu la sogs pa ni rang gi rigs bzhin no //
T02TD1677E:262a-7: 'dod 'byung gi gnas ni ser po la phyi'i ra ba ni sngo gnag go //
T02TD1677E:262a-8: de dag gi gnas rnams su ni rten gyi mtshan ma gang rung gzhag go //
T02TD1677E:262a-9: des dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa dag kyang byin gyis brlabs te dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:262a-10: gzhan yang mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa dang /
T02TD1677E:262a-11: mchod pa thams cad kyi gtor ma'i rdzas dag kyang byin gyis brlabs te gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:262a-12: de nas dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bsrung bar bya zhing sta gon gyi lha rnams dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su dgod do //
T02TD1677E:262a-13: yang rdo rje rgyal pos gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1677E:262a-15: dmigs pa dang po gnyis kyis dkyil 'khor mnyes par byas nas gsol ba gdab bo //
T02TD1677E:262a-16: de nas rnal 'byor pho mo rgyan dang bcas pas rdo rje dril bu thogs te yi ge brgya pas bskang zhing /
T02TD1677E:262a-17: stang stabs dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor la lan bdun du bskor ro //
T02TD1677E:262a-18: de nas rdo rje rgyal po dang /
T02TD1677E:262a-23: rdul phyag la sogs pa so sor phye ste /
T02TD1677E:262a-24: so sor gdan bsham zhing dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:262a-25: de dag snga ma'i gnas ji lta ba las /
T02TD1677E:262a-26: phyis mi 'gyur bar rang rang gi rnal 'byor gyis 'khod cing phyogs kun nas langs te /
T02TD1677E:262a-27: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dag gis byin phab nas /
T02TD1677E:262a-28: gnas dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa mnga' gsol lo //
T02TD1677E:262a-29: de nas gsang ba'i theg pa'i 'jug sgo shes pas /
T02TD1677E:262a-30: gzhan las dpag par bya ba'i phyir brda sgo dbye /
T02TD1677E:262a-31: tha mal gyi tshig spang zhing /
T02TD1677E:262a-32: rdo rje rgyal theb kyi sgo nas lus kyi brda la gnas par bya zhing /
T02TD1677E:262a-33: phyogs bzhi nas phyag 'tshal zhing gsol ba gdab ste /
T02TD1677E:262a-34: sbyor ba'i gar thabs kyis gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:262b-0: gzhan yang dur khrod kyi bdag po la sogs pa gdul ba'i phyir dpal he ru ka la sogs pa'i nga rgyal gyis glang po che'i stod g-yogs la sogs pas lus mtshan par @262b bya ste /
T02TD1677E:262b-1: sngags kyis spyang zhing byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD1677E:262b-2: gti mug dag par bya ba dang /
T02TD1677E:262b-3: 'dod chags dag par bya ba dang /
T02TD1677E:262b-4: nga rgyal dag par bya ba'i phyir ni mnabs pa'i rgyan bgo'o //
T02TD1677E:262b-5: zhe sdang dag par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD1677E:262b-6: phrag dog dag par bya ba'i phyir ni gdags pa'i rgyan bgo'o //
T02TD1677E:262b-7: thugs rje chen po'i chags pa dang /
T02TD1677E:262b-8: byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing srid pa gsum gdul ba'i phyir ni byug pa'i rgyan bgo'o //
T02TD1677E:262b-9: des ni dur khrod la dngos po gdul zhing rang gi don ston pa'o //
T02TD1677E:262b-10: de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la bsdus nas dmigs su med pa'i don la gnas pa las /
T02TD1677E:262b-11: yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis bslang bar bsams nas rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bzhengs te 'di brjod do //
T02TD1677E:262b-12: rgyal ba rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor na //
T02TD1677E:262b-13: 'byung ba lnga yi mtshan nyid las //
T02TD1677E:262b-14: zhi ba'i lha ni lhan ne ba'i //
T02TD1677E:262b-15: thugs rje 'gro kun de las skyes //
T02TD1677E:262b-16: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02TD1677E:262b-17: shin tu khro drag gtum par 'gyur //
T02TD1677E:262b-18: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02TD1677E:262b-19: shin tu chags shing zhen par 'gyur //
T02TD1677E:262b-20: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02TD1677E:262b-21: shin tu gti mug che bar 'gyur //
T02TD1677E:262b-22: de ltar dug gsum bdo pa la //
T02TD1677E:262b-23: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD1677E:262b-24: shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma las //
T02TD1677E:262b-25: rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu drag / aom ma h'a shr'i he ru ka sa ma ya kro dha ha la ha la h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:262b-27: thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa las //
T02TD1677E:262b-31: h'um mi rtag mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1677E:262b-32: nam mkha'i khro bo za byed cing //
T02TD1677E:262b-34: zhal du stong khams ma lus thim //
T02TD1677E:262b-35: zad par byed cing stong bar byed //
T02TD1677E:262b-36: rgas rgud brlag par byed pa'o //
T02TD1677E:262b-37: glog gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba //
T02TD1677E:262b-38: myur ba'i za byed chen po lngas //
T02TD1677E:262b-40: brlag cing za byed stong par byed //
T02TD1677E:262b-41: rigs chen za byed khros pa'i tshe //
T02TD1677E:262b-42: sku ni sngo skya thal ba'i ngang //
T02TD1677E:262b-44: ru lu ru lus ma lus za //
T02TD1677E:262b-47: gang 'dir bskal pa kun brlag tshe //
T02TD1677E:263a-2: za byed khros pa lnga po yis //
T02TD1677E:263a-3: zhal du stong khams ma lus thim //
T02TD1677E:263a-4: aom buddha shr'i he ru ka sa ma ya kro dha aom aom ha ha h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD1677E:263a-5: dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo smug nag phyag na 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1677E:263a-6: thod khrag 'dzin pa grangs med pa'i tshogs rnams sprul pa dang bcas par gnas so //
T02TD1677E:263a-7: aom badzra shr'i he ru ka sa ma ya kro dha h'um h'um ru lu phat /
T02TD1677E:263a-8: lag pa g-yas pa la rdo rje khro bo sku sngo skya /
T02TD1677E:263a-9: lag na rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
T02TD1677E:263a-10: kha tv'am ga thogs ba grangs med pa'i chogs sprul pa dang bcas par ro //
T02TD1677E:263a-11: aom ratna shr'i he ru ka sa ma ya kro dha tram tram he he h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263a-12: lag pa g-yon pa na rin po che khro bo ser nag tri sh'u la dang /
T02TD1677E:263a-13: ral gri thogs pa grangs med pa /
T02TD1677E:263a-14: sprul pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1677E:263a-15: aom padma shr'i he ru ka sa ma ya kro dha hr'i:hr'i:da ha na h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263a-16: rkang pa g-yon pa la padma'i khro bo dmar nag phyag na ral gri rtse gsum dang /
T02TD1677E:263a-17: gtun shing thogs pa grangs med pa sprul par bcas pa'o //
T02TD1677E:263a-18: aom karma shr'i he ru ka sa ma ya kro dha ham ham raksha ka h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263a-19: rkang pa g-yas pa la las kyi khro bo ljang nag phyag na sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02TD1677E:263a-20: lcags kyu thogs pa grangs med pa sprul pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1677E:263a-21: aom shr'i bhee ra ba h'um ma h'a de ba h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263a-22: mtshan ma la lha chen po mdog dkar po /
T02TD1677E:263a-23: lag na tri sh'u la dang /
T02TD1677E:263a-24: thod pa zogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1677E:263a-25: aom bishn'u ka ma pa la tsakra h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263a-26: snying gar khyab 'jug mthing nag lag na 'khor lo dang /
T02TD1677E:263a-27: thod pa thogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1677E:263a-28: aom raksha da sha gri ba h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263a-29: mgrin par srin po'i rgyal po ljang skya /
T02TD1677E:263a-31: tho ba thogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1677E:263a-32: aom ma h'a pa sha ha la h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263a-33: sku'i gnas su bzhugs pa nag po sngo skya lag na zhags pa dang thod pa thogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1677E:263a-34: aom badzra bhee ra h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263a-35: brla gnyis la rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'jigs pa ljang skya /
T02TD1677E:263a-36: rdo rje rtse gsum dang thod pa thogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD1677E:263a-37: de dag kun kyang rang rang gi yum dang 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas so //
T02TD1677E:263a-38: lag pa'i sor mo bcu la mche ba can lnga ba dang /
T02TD1677E:263a-39: sder mo can lnga dag sngags 'dis gsal bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:263a-40: aom ma h'a dhe ki shv'a ri bi ka ma ru sha ha ha he he ru lu h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263b-0: @263b ye shes glog gi dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD1677E:263b-1: 'jigs pa'i khro bo gtum po'i tshogs //
T02TD1677E:263b-2: cir yang gyur pa'i mtshon cha yis //
T02TD1677E:263b-3: sdug bsngal gnas rnams rab tu bcom //
T02TD1677E:263b-4: ma rungs dur khrod gzhig pa'i phyir //
T02TD1677E:263b-5: stong gsum gnas rnams bsgral bar bya //
T02TD1677E:263b-6: 'jigs byed drag shul chen po yis //
T02TD1677E:263b-7: khams gsum cig car bsgral nas kyang //
T02TD1677E:263b-8: za byed chen po'i zhal du ni //
T02TD1677E:263b-11: 'jigs byed khyed lngas kun za na //
T02TD1677E:263b-12: dngos por gyur pa'i bgegs 'di kun //
T02TD1677E:263b-13: ngas bstabs khyed kyis yul la gsol //
T02TD1677E:263b-14: ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs byed du //
T02TD1677E:263b-15: sems can nyon mongs sdang byed pas //
T02TD1677E:263b-16: de phyir nga ni rdo rje che //
T02TD1677E:263b-17: zhe sdang zhes ni grags pa yin //
T02TD1677E:263b-18: ngan song 'jigs pa chen po ru //
T02TD1677E:263b-19: sems can thams cad rmongs byed pa //
T02TD1677E:263b-20: de phyir nga ni gti mug che //
T02TD1677E:263b-21: rtag tu thub pa mchog yin no //
T02TD1677E:263b-22: srid pa'i 'dod chags myos ba rnams //
T02TD1677E:263b-23: 'dod chags nyid kyis mtshams sbyor bas //
T02TD1677E:263b-24: de phyir chos kyi rdo rje ni //
T02TD1677E:263b-25: 'dod chags chen po'i mchog yin no //
T02TD1677E:263b-26: bde chen sbyin pa'i sprin gyis ni //
T02TD1677E:263b-27: sems can thams cad nga rgyal bskyed //
T02TD1677E:263b-28: nam mkha' bde bas bsdus pa'i phyir //
T02TD1677E:263b-29: bde chen 'dod pa nga yin no //
T02TD1677E:263b-30: ro la sogs pa mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1677E:263b-31: phrag dog rdo rje gdon mi za //
T02TD1677E:263b-32: sna tshogs las kyi khro bo'i sku //
T02TD1677E:263b-33: phrag dog chen po'i mchog yin no //
T02TD1677E:263b-34: nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD1677E:263b-35: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku //
T02TD1677E:263b-36: ye shes rno dpal mtshon cha yis //
T02TD1677E:263b-37: log rtog 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod do ;
T02TD1677E:263b-38: / chos nyid mnyam nyid nam mkha' la //
T02TD1677E:263b-40: gnas med dmigs pa yod ma yin //
T02TD1677E:263b-41: brtse ba med cing brten pa med //
T02TD1677E:263b-42: aom da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga te he tun h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263b-43: aom pa tsa pa tsa sarba na ra ka ga te he tun h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263b-44: aom ma tha ma tha sarba na ra ka ga te he tun h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263b-45: aom sarba durga sarba karma sarba kle shatstshinda tstshinda h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263b-46: sarba bidya tstshinda tstshinda h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263b-47: sarba bidya khadga tstshinda tstshinda h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263b-48: aom tri bi shva m'u la tstshinda tstshinda h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:263b-49: dpal chen 'bar ba rgyal po'i sku //
T02TD1677E:263b-50: rngam brjid khros pa'i cha lugs 'bar //
T02TD1677E:263b-51: gar dgu dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD1677E:264a-2: 'jo tshul gar mdzad lta bu yis //
T02TD1677E:264a-3: bdud dang srin po 'dul bar mdzad //
T02TD1677E:264a-4: ma tang la sogs bgegs byed rnams //
T02TD1677E:264a-5: gzugs dang bcas pa'i tshogs bsdus te //
T02TD1677E:264a-6: pra ti ta yi phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1677E:264a-7: nges par gzugs la dbab par bya //
T02TD1677E:264a-8: gzugs brnyan bri la sogs pa la //
T02TD1677E:264a-9: phyag rgya bzhi yis mnyes byas nas //
T02TD1677E:264a-11: de yi 'khor tshogs bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:264a-12: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings te gyen du bteg nas /
T02TD1677E:264a-13: aom ma h'a kam pa la dha ri shva ya h'um /
T02TD1677E:264a-14: a'a k'arsha ya h'um dza: zhes brjod cing /
T02TD1677E:264a-15: rdo rje gshog pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas zil gyis mnan cing bstim mo //
T02TD1677E:264a-16: 'phags pa thams cad bdag la gson //
T02TD1677E:264a-17: 'byung po mang po kun nyon cig / stobs chen dpal ldan he ru ka'i //
T02TD1677E:264a-18: rdo rje rnon po 'jam dpal gyi //
T02TD1677E:264a-19: thugs rje dang ni shes rab dang //
T02TD1677E:264a-20: thabs la mkhas pa'i byin rlabs kyis//
T02TD1677E:264a-21: bdag dang 'gro ba bsrung bar mdzod //
T02TD1677E:264a-22: 'gro ba rnams kyi tshe dang srog / gson po'i bde ba gcod byed pa'i //
T02TD1677E:264a-23: bdud dang srin po 'khor bcas kun //
T02TD1677E:264a-24: bcom zhing gsang ba'i gnyen po ni //
T02TD1677E:264a-25: bde gshegs thugs kyi dngos grub mchog / srid gsum thal byed rngam pa des //
T02TD1677E:264a-26: kha tv'am drag po mi bzad pas //
T02TD1677E:264a-27: bdud dang srin po 'khor bcas dang //
T02TD1677E:264a-28: gshin rje bcom zhing bsad nas ni //
T02TD1677E:264a-29: ro yang lho yi 'dzam gling du //
T02TD1677E:264a-30: bor nas sa gzhir gyur pa ni //
T02TD1677E:264a-31: dur khrod chen po brgyad yin no //
T02TD1677E:264a-32: mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan //
T02TD1677E:264a-33: rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan //
T02TD1677E:264a-34: lag pa g-yas g-yon mtshams su bstan //
T02TD1677E:264a-36: aom sarba p'a bam ka ra te ta ba bi shva ma ta ka ru dra h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:264a-37: aom sarba p'a pa ka ra he ta pa bi shva ka tv'am ga ru dra h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:264a-38: aom sarba p'a pam ka ra he ta pa bi shva a'a k'arsha ru dra h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:264a-39: gnas kyi sgo ni su yis bcad //
T02TD1677E:264a-40: sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci //
T02TD1677E:264a-41: gzung 'dzin rkang pa bsnol ba las //
T02TD1677E:264a-42: yul las 'das pa'i zhabs kyis dbye //
T02TD1677E:264a-43: de nas g-yas su bskor te /
T02TD1677E:264a-44: lte ba'i phyogs su ae gru gsum gyi sgo phye nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas rnam par shes pa drangs te /
T02TD1677E:264b-0: aom ma h'a tso sha phyung zhes gnas gsum gyi zhing khams gang rung @264b du rigs lhun gyis grub pa'i sras su bya'o //
T02TD1677E:264b-1: de nas khog pa gzhal yas khang du byas te /
T02TD1677E:264b-2: rnal 'byor pa rnams nang du bzhugs nas /
T02TD1677E:264b-3: nang khrol gyi tshogs rnams dug gsum rnam par dag pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyis mchod par dmigs shing /
T02TD1677E:264b-4: dga' ba'i glu gar dang rol mos mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:264b-5: de nas lha thams cad la bstod cing bskul ba'i phyir rdo rje'i glu blang ste /
T02TD1677E:264b-6: kha tv'am ga la rgyab rten bcas //
T02TD1677E:264b-7: nam mkha'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1677E:264b-8: nam mkha' kun las grol ba 'grub //
T02TD1677E:264b-9: dngos po thams cad mkha' byin pa //
T02TD1677E:264b-10: mkha' las sgyu ma kun blangs nas //
T02TD1677E:264b-11: lus pa med par der za'o //
T02TD1677E:264b-14: ghande'i sgra yis sgrol bar mdzad //
T02TD1677E:264b-15: la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin //
T02TD1677E:264b-16: la lar tshangs pa bzhin du zhi //
T02TD1677E:264b-17: la lar tshangs pa bzhin du zhi //
T02TD1677E:264b-18: la lar gshin rje bzhin du rngam //
T02TD1677E:264b-19: la lar dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar //
T02TD1677E:264b-20: 'jig rten khams ni stong dag na //
T02TD1677E:264b-21: mi sdug rigs kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i //
T02TD1677E:264b-23: ma lus lus pa med par sgrol //
T02TD1677E:264b-25: gzhan yang sha khrag rus pa'i tshogs rnams za byed kyi tshogs dang 'jigs byed kyi zhal du dbul ba ni //
T02TD1677E:264b-26: bstabs su gsol gcig he ru ka //
T02TD1677E:264b-27: gang la bya ba'i dngos po 'di //
T02TD1677E:264b-28: phra man gshed ma khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD1677E:264b-29: dbang dang rig sngags byin brlabs te //
T02TD1677E:264b-30: rig sngags kyis ni rmongs mdzad nas //
T02TD1677E:264b-31: drag po las kyis sgrub byed cing //
T02TD1677E:264b-32: 'di la sogs pa rnams la yang //
T02TD1677E:264b-33: de dag longs spyod rgyan du 'bul //
T02TD1677E:264b-34: sha dang rkang khrag 'dod ba rnams //
T02TD1677E:264b-35: rig sngags kyis ni byin brlabs nas //
T02TD1677E:264b-36: 'cho ba phrogs nas ci bde bar //
T02TD1677E:264b-37: khyed kyis de la longs spyod cig / bhandha bcud yangs zab pa na //
T02TD1677E:264b-38: khor yug gtos kyi dngos po 'di //
T02TD1677E:264b-39: bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir //
T02TD1677E:264b-40: 'jigs byed dka' zlog dgyes shing rol ;
T02TD1677E:264b-41: / rdo rje gsum 'bar sku gsung thugs //
T02TD1677E:264b-42: srid gsum 'joms mdzod tri sh'u la //
T02TD1677E:264b-43: dug gsum rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir //
T02TD1677E:264b-44: khams gsum cig car bsgral bar bya //
T02TD1677E:264b-45: 'jigs byed drag shul chen po yis //
T02TD1677E:264b-46: khams gsum cig car bsgral nas kyang //
T02TD1677E:265a-1: byed chen po'i zhal du ni //
T02TD1677E:265a-4: 'jigs byed khyed lngas kun za na //
T02TD1677E:265a-5: dngos por gyur pa'i bgegs 'di kun //
T02TD1677E:265a-6: ngas bstabs khyed kyis yul la bzhes //
T02TD1677E:265a-7: aom ma h'a shr'i hi du ka ha ha ha ha ru lu ru lu h'um bhyo kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02TD1677E:265a-8: shar phyogs 'jig rten lam sgo na //
T02TD1677E:265a-9: yang dag thar lam gcod byed pa //
T02TD1677E:265a-10: 'byung po gtum po nga rgyal can //
T02TD1677E:265a-11: khyod ni sgrib pa kun la bsgribs //
T02TD1677E:265a-12: yang dag thar lam ye shes kyi //
T02TD1677E:265a-13: khungs brtag rtsad bcad bdag las byung //
T02TD1677E:265a-14: bdag 'dzin bdag gi rtog pa rnams //
T02TD1677E:265a-15: bdag med stong pa'i tho bas gzham //
T02TD1677E:265a-16: a'atma na hi ma h'a sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham //
T02TD1677E:265a-17: chos kun rtag tu rang gi ngo bos stong /
T02TD1677E:265a-18: rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos po rnam par 'jigs //
T02TD1677E:265a-19: srid pa ji bzhin yong ye stong pa ste ;
T02TD1677E:265a-20: / nyi tshe'i stong nyid mu stegs can rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1677E:265a-21: 'dod pa'i khams stong pa nyid do //
T02TD1677E:265a-22: gzugs kyi khams stong pa nyid do //
T02TD1677E:265a-23: gzugs med pa'i khams stong pa nyid do //
T02TD1677E:265a-24: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi lus stong pa nyid do //
T02TD1677E:265a-27: gang dag stong nyid mi shes pa //
T02TD1677E:265a-28: de yis mya ngan 'das mi shes //
T02TD1677E:265a-29: de phyir dngos po dngos med pas //
T02TD1677E:265a-30: 'jigs pas stong nyid shes par bya //
T02TD1677E:265a-31: chen po stong pa zhes bya ba //
T02TD1677E:265a-32: kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa'o //
T02TD1677E:265a-33: de bas rnam pa thams cad du //
T02TD1677E:265a-34: stong nyid rjes su dran par bya //
T02TD1677E:265a-35: aom dharma dh'a tu badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes pas /
T02TD1677E:265a-36: mtshan ma'i rtog tshogs kun mi rtog ye shes kyis gzhom par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:265a-37: de bas bhandha mtshan dang ldan pa dag byin gyis brlab cing /
T02TD1677E:265a-38: rang rang gi gnas su me mar dang bcas pas dgram pa dang /
T02TD1677E:265a-39: dur khrod chen po brgyad dag dgod do //
T02TD1677E:265a-40: shar du rkang pa g-yas pa'o //
T02TD1677E:265a-41: nub tu lag pa g-yon pa'o //
T02TD1677E:265a-42: byang du rkang pa g-yon pa'o //
T02TD1677E:265a-45: nub byang du dku g-yon pa'o //
T02TD1677E:265b-1: de ltar dug gsum gyi rten bsags nas //
T02TD1677E:265b-2: zhing skyong la sogs pa'i gzugs bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:265b-3: gzhan yang dbang sgyur chen po'i ting nge 'dzin las bh'um gyi 'phro 'dus gnas byin gyis brlab pa dang //
T02TD1677E:265b-4: rnal 'byor pa thams cad rang gi lhar bsgom pa dang //
T02TD1677E:265b-5: sgrub rdzas thams cad yi ge gsum gyis bsregs shing sbyangs nas byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1677E:265b-6: lha mo krong dhi shva ris byin gyis brlabs pa'i dri chab kyis dag par bya ba dang /
T02TD1677E:265b-8: tshogs kyi zhal zas byin gyis brlab pa rnams sngags dang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyis rdzogs par byas nas sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi so so'i gnas su dgram par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:265b-9: de dag gis ni sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag gi cho ga bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1677E:265b-10: da ni bsnyen pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir phyag rgya lngas mtshan cing chos gos lnga bgos te /
T02TD1677E:265b-11: 'gro ba'i don du dam bcas nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs te /
T02TD1677E:265b-15: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang /
T02TD1677E:265b-16: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang /
T02TD1677E:265b-17: gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang /
T02TD1677E:265b-19: thun mong gi bzlas brjod dang /
T02TD1677E:265b-20: khyad par gyi bzlas brjod dang /
T02TD1677E:265b-21: de dag rdzogs nas mchod cing bstod pa byas la /
T02TD1677E:265b-22: lha rnams la thugs dam bskul bar bya //
T02TD1677E:265b-23: gal te rnal 'byor ba mtshan ma thob pa zhig gis 'jug na ni thig le 'am /
T02TD1677E:265b-25: rnam par dag pa spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:265b-26: de nas tshogs kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD1677E:265b-28: lhag ma'i las dag pa'i bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1677E:265b-29: cho ga rdzogs pa'i las la sbyar ro //
T02TD1677E:265b-30: de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir gong du dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa tsam las ma byas pa dag la ni snga ma bzhin dus su bar mtshams su gzhag nas rig pa'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD1677E:265b-31: de bzhin du gang thob pa nas brtsams te /
T02TD1677E:265b-32: rdzogs pa'i bar du spyang bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:265b-33: de dag gi rim pa ni 'di ltar yin te /
T02TD1677E:265b-34: dang po gong rol du 'jug pa'i cho ga la /
T02TD1677E:266a-2: / rgyal theb cho ga rdzogs pas slob ma yongs su sbyangs pa dang /
T02TD1677E:266a-3: bar khang gi sgo mtshams su mandala bshams pa la bzhag ste /
T02TD1677E:266a-4: byang gi sgo drung na gnas pa'i bum pas bsangs nas /
T02TD1677E:266a-5: rigs kyi lha mchod cing gsol ba btab nas shis par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:266a-7: dkar po ser po dag la /
T02TD1677E:266a-8: aa kham b'i ra h'um h'um /
T02TD1677E:266a-9: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs nas gdong g-yogs te /
T02TD1677E:266a-10: rin po che'i phreng ba thogs nas theg pa chen por mos shing sems bskyed pas gnas pa la slob dpon gyis dri ste /
T02TD1677E:266a-11: kye khyod ci la dga' bas 'dir 'jug pa yin zhes pa dang /
T02TD1677E:266a-12: slob mas kyang bdag skal ba bzang po la dga' bas 'jug pa'o zhes so //
T02TD1677E:266a-13: slar brjod pa de khyod la ci dgos zhes so //
T02TD1677E:266a-15: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
T02TD1677E:266a-17: bde gshegs sras bcas dam tshig pas //
T02TD1677E:266a-18: yon dbul thugs rjes bdag la dgongs //
T02TD1677E:266a-19: sangs rgyas sku gsung rang bzhin mchog / slob dpon mgon la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1677E:266a-20: skal bzang lha mo'i tshogs bcas pa'i //
T02TD1677E:266a-22: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD1677E:266a-23: mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02TD1677E:266a-26: rgyal ba kun gyi gnas bzhugs pa'i //
T02TD1677E:266a-27: dkyil 'khor chen po nyams dga' ba //
T02TD1677E:266a-28: snying po'i grong khyer chen po 'dir //
T02TD1677E:266a-29: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD1677E:266a-31: de nas las kyi rdo rjes lag pa g-yas pa nas bzung ste /
T02TD1677E:266a-32: aom sarba yo ga tsitta autp'a da ya mi h'um /
T02TD1677E:266a-33: zhes brjod cing yol ba'i nang du gzhug ste /
T02TD1677E:266a-34: dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor bzhag la 'di skad brjod do //
T02TD1677E:266a-35: aom thog ma med dus 'khor ba'i gnas //
T02TD1677E:266a-36: bdag gis bsags pa'i las gang gis //
T02TD1677E:266a-37: bgyid stsal yi rang dus 'dir bshags //
T02TD1677E:266a-38: phyin chad mi bgyid sdom pa gzung //
T02TD1677E:266a-39: rgyal ba sras sogs dge rtsa bzhi //
T02TD1677E:266a-40: 'gro gzhan legs byas gang yin pa //
T02TD1677E:266a-41: de dag kun la rjes yi rang //
T02TD1677E:266a-42: byang chub chen por bdag gis bsngo //
T02TD1677E:266a-43: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
T02TD1677E:266b-0: bdag gis dus 'dir @266b skyabs su gsol //
T02TD1677E:266b-1: nyon mongs sdug bsngal bcad pa dang //
T02TD1677E:266b-2: dge ba'i tshogs mang spel ba'i phyir //
T02TD1677E:266b-3: byang chub bde chen don bskyed nas //
T02TD1677E:266b-4: 'gro rnams di ring don du gnyer //
T02TD1677E:266b-5: sangs rgyas gyur nas bdag gis ni //
T02TD1677E:266b-6: 'gro rnams srid pa'i gnas nas gnon //
T02TD1677E:266b-8: de nas rdo rje me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa slob ma'i snying gar bzhag ste /
T02TD1677E:266b-9: aom bde gshegs kun gyis khyod nyid ni //
T02TD1677E:266b-10: de ring byin gyis brlabs pa na //
T02TD1677E:266b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang chen 'di //
T02TD1677E:266b-12: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing //
T02TD1677E:266b-13: dad pa med pa'i mi rnams la //
T02TD1677E:266b-14: nams kyang smra bar bya ba min //
T02TD1677E:266b-15: aom su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho siddhi badzra ya th'a su kham /
T02TD1677E:266b-16: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD1677E:266b-17: snying la yang dag zhugs mdzad de //
T02TD1677E:266b-18: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD1677E:266b-19: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD1677E:266b-20: aom ma h'a sa ma ya au da ka tha /
T02TD1677E:266b-21: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD1677E:266b-22: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD1677E:266b-23: dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub ni //
T02TD1677E:266b-25: aom a'a:h'um sarba panytsa aa mri ta h'um /
T02TD1677E:266b-26: badzra au da ka ta hri tha /
T02TD1677E:266b-27: de ring phyin chad khyod nyid kyi //
T02TD1677E:266b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' nga yin pas //
T02TD1677E:266b-29: gang zhig bsgo ba'i las rnams byos //
T02TD1677E:266b-30: de la brnyas par ma byed cig / gal te cung zhig brnyas byas na //
T02TD1677E:266b-31: dus min 'chi zhing dmyal bar ltung //
T02TD1677E:266b-32: rgyal ba kun gyi ye shes thugs //
T02TD1677E:266b-33: sku dang gsung 'phrul las mdzad pa //
T02TD1677E:266b-34: phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis //
T02TD1677E:266b-35: di ring bdag la dbab tu gsol //
T02TD1677E:266b-37: slob ma'i snying gar bde gshegs bzhugs pa dang /
T02TD1677E:266b-38: bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs pas /
T02TD1677E:266b-39: dngos grub sbyin zhing dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:266b-43: spyi bo rnams su 'byung ba'i sa bon gyi mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:266b-46: zhes pas bsrung zhing rdo rje dril bu dkrol te /
T02TD1677E:266b-47: aom dzny'a na a'a be sha ya stam bha ya ra ra ra ra tsa la ya tsa la ya h'um a'a ha dzhee:/
T02TD1677E:266b-48: zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do //
T02TD1677E:266b-49: nam zhig ye shes babs pa'i tshe ni sku dang /
T02TD1677E:267a-2: rdo rje slob dpon gyis bden pa brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1677E:267a-4: slob ma'i mchog 'di gzhug par bgyi //
T02TD1677E:267a-5: rigs kyi lha yi bye brag dang //
T02TD1677E:267a-6: bsod nams gang yin de bzhin shog / de bzhin dngos grub mtshan pa dag / snying po'i gnas 'dir legs par ston //
T02TD1677E:267a-7: zhes brjod cing kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bye brag la brtags te /
T02TD1677E:267a-8: des rang gi las dag grub par shes so //
T02TD1677E:267a-9: de nas me tog phreng ba dkyil 'khor du dor te //
T02TD1677E:267a-10: aom pra t'i tstsha badzra ho:/
T02TD1677E:267a-11: zhes pas lha gang la babs pa de yi dam du blang bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:267a-12: de yang gtso bo la bab na ni mchog gi dngos grub 'grub cing /
T02TD1677E:267a-13: bar mtshams dag gis ni 'bring gi las 'grub la /
T02TD1677E:267a-14: ra ba las 'das pa dag gis ni slar bskyar te lan gsum du dor zhing /
T02TD1677E:267a-15: gang zhig dkyil 'khor la ma bab pa dag ni chus shis par byas te slar gtang bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:267a-16: yang phreng ba de blangs te slob ma'i mgo la bcings nas /
T02TD1677E:267a-17: kye sems dpa' chen po phreng ba 'di dang mi 'bral bar gyis shig / aom ratna m'a le aa bhi shinytsa tr'am /
T02TD1677E:267a-19: yi ge aom gyis bskyed pa'i gser gyi thur ma phras mtshan pas dri ma bsal nas //
T02TD1677E:267a-20: aom rdo rje sems dpa' khyod nyid kyi //
T02TD1677E:267a-21: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02TD1677E:267a-22: sgrib g-yogs ling thog kun bsal nas //
T02TD1677E:267a-23: rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
T02TD1677E:267a-24: aom badzra tsakshu dzny'a na pra be sha phat /
T02TD1677E:267a-27: dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir sgo dbye ste ;
T02TD1677E:267a-28: bu khyod dkyil 'khor legs par ltos //
T02TD1677E:267a-29: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD1677E:267a-30: phreng ba gang la bab pa ni //
T02TD1677E:267a-31: de nyid khyod kyi rigs kyi lha //
T02TD1677E:267a-32: zhes shar phyogs kyi sgo nas brtsams shing gtso bo'i bar du lha rnams kyi mtshan bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:267a-33: de'i rjes la bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyis lha dang slob dpon dang /
T02TD1677E:267a-34: rnal 'byor pa dag myos par byas nas /
T02TD1677E:267a-35: slob dpon la sems dad pa'i sgo nas bdag gi skal ba ji ltar lags pa bstan du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:267a-37: bu khyod dad pa rab tu bskyed //
T02TD1677E:267b-1: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02TD1677E:267b-3: 'gro ba phun sum tshogs kun dang //
T02TD1677E:267b-4: dngos rnams thams cad mngon du 'gyur //
T02TD1677E:267b-5: dam tshig ting 'dzin rjes chags dang //
T02TD1677E:267b-6: gsang sngags snying po 'dzin par gyis //
T02TD1677E:267b-8: de nas dbang bskur ba'i don du /
T02TD1677E:267b-9: slob ma yon dang bcas pas gsol ba gdab ste /
T02TD1677E:267b-10: rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i lam //
T02TD1677E:267b-11: 'gro ba skyob la gzi brjid can //
T02TD1677E:267b-12: mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo mchog / yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02TD1677E:267b-13: de ring dbang bskur gnang ba yi //
T02TD1677E:267b-14: dus la bab par 'os pa lags //
T02TD1677E:267b-15: dpa' bo chen pos mi ldog pa'i //
T02TD1677E:267b-16: dbang bskur rim bzhin bdag la stsol //
T02TD1677E:267b-17: rig pa chen pos las bsgrubs nas //
T02TD1677E:267b-18: dngos grub mchog rnams shis pa dang //
T02TD1677E:267b-19: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1677E:267b-20: bdag gis rdo rje slob dpon gzung //
T02TD1677E:267b-22: de nas shar gyi phyogs kyi sgo drung du //
T02TD1677E:267b-23: khor do tsam gyis chod par dbang stegs dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba dang mnyam par brtsigs te /
T02TD1677E:267b-24: padma 'dab brgyad sgo dang bcas pa bris nas /
T02TD1677E:267b-25: seng ge'i khri la padmas mtshan pa'i gdan la bsham zhing slob ma bzhag ste /
T02TD1677E:267b-27: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD1677E:267b-29: gos sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas nas /
T02TD1677E:267b-31: yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg dang /
T02TD1677E:267b-32: ku sha'i chus shis pa'i cho ga bya'o //
T02TD1677E:267b-33: yang bdud rtsi byin gyis brlabs pa'i chu 'thor zhing /
T02TD1677E:267b-34: rta mchog gi sngags kyis bsrungs nas yi ge gsum gyis spyang bar bya zhing /
T02TD1677E:267b-35: chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin las rigs kyi lhar bskyed de /
T02TD1677E:267b-37: rol mo'i sil snyan du bcas pas bum pa'i nang nas chu blangs te /
T02TD1677E:267b-38: dung chos la sogs par blugs la tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:267b-39: til gyi gong bu bzhin gang ba'i //
T02TD1677E:267b-40: rgyal ba'i bum pa bzung nas ni //
T02TD1677E:267b-41: 'di gnyis la ni blugs byas las //
T02TD1677E:267b-42: bag chags ma lus dag gyur cig / ces phyi'i bum pa'i chus khrus byas nas /
T02TD1677E:268a-1: sngags las byung ba'i lcags kyus ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bkug ste /
T02TD1677E:268a-2: mdun rol du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bzhag nas gnyis su med pa'i rol pa mdzad cing /
T02TD1677E:268a-3: byang chub kyi sems kyi chu rgyan gyis lha'i bum pa bkang ste /
T02TD1677E:268a-4: gar dang dbyangs su bcas pas phyogs bzhi nas khrus mdzad do //
T02TD1677E:268a-5: aom lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD1677E:268a-6: rdo rje gsang gsum gnas las byung //
T02TD1677E:268a-7: rig pa'i lha mo tshogs ldan pa'i //
T02TD1677E:268a-8: rang bzhin gcig tu gyur pa yin //
T02TD1677E:268a-9: aom badzra aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02TD1677E:268a-11: des ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo ston te /
T02TD1677E:268a-13: de nas rin po che'i rgyu las byas pa'am /
T02TD1677E:268a-14: gzhan dag las byung ba gang yang rung ste /
T02TD1677E:268a-15: dbu rgyan rtse lnga pa sangs rgyas lnga'i mtshan ma dang /
T02TD1677E:268a-16: dar dbyangs su bcas pa byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1677E:268a-17: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:268a-18: aom sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi //
T02TD1677E:268a-19: rin chen las byung dbu rgyan chen //
T02TD1677E:268a-20: thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i //
T02TD1677E:268a-21: dar dbyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya //
T02TD1677E:268a-22: aom badzra da ra ta ka badzra aa ra li ho aa bhi shinytsa tr'am /
T02TD1677E:268a-24: de'i rjes la thod pa'i mtshan ma drug dang bcas pa'i dar dbyangs kyis bcings te /
T02TD1677E:268a-25: aom sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes rtags //
T02TD1677E:268a-26: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan gyis //
T02TD1677E:268a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sngon bskyed //
T02TD1677E:268a-28: rig pa'i ye shes mtshan ma'i rtags //
T02TD1677E:268a-29: h'um badzra ka p'a la aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02TD1677E:268a-30: des ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin dpal rdo rje nyi ma byang chub sems kyi ngo bo dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1677E:268a-31: de nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par spyang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02TD1677E:268a-32: lag pa g-yas par gsor zhing /
T02TD1677E:268a-33: slob ma'i snying gar gtugs te /
T02TD1677E:268a-34: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1677E:268a-35: rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i don //
T02TD1677E:268a-36: de ring khyod la dbang bskur te //
T02TD1677E:268a-37: rab tu grub phyir gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1677E:268a-38: aom badzra satva aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02TD1677E:268a-40: slob ma'i lag pa g-yas par gtad nas lan gsum gsor te thugs kar bzung ngo //
T02TD1677E:268b-0: @268b aom thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1677E:268b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD1677E:268b-2: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1677E:268b-3: rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag / ces brjod cing don bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:268b-4: des ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin dpal padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi ngo bo mtshon par byed pa rdo rje'i dbang ngo //
T02TD1677E:268b-5: de nas dril bu spyang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa dkrol zhing slob ma'i lag pa g-yon par gtad la /
T02TD1677E:268b-7: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02TD1677E:268b-8: khyod kyis rtag tu bcang bar gyis //
T02TD1677E:268b-9: byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed //
T02TD1677E:268b-10: aom aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02TD1677E:268b-11: zhes brjod cing de nyid rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1677E:268b-12: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02TD1677E:268b-13: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems can rnams //
T02TD1677E:268b-14: dam pa'i srid pa byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1677E:268b-16: de nas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rta mchog rol pa'i ngo bo mtshon par byed pa dril bu'i dbang ngo //
T02TD1677E:268b-17: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dril bu gnyis gzung ba'i phyag rgya bstan te /
T02TD1677E:268b-18: thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'i 'phro 'du dang bcas par slob ma'i mgo bor bzhag nas /
T02TD1677E:268b-19: tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:268b-20: aom gang phyir chos rnams rnam dag pas //
T02TD1677E:268b-21: sangs rgyas ye shes rang bzhin nyid //
T02TD1677E:268b-22: dbang po'i spyod yul gang dag gang //
T02TD1677E:268b-23: bde mchog sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
T02TD1677E:268b-24: aom dpal che ge mo aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02TD1677E:268b-25: badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta ya ho zhes so //
T02TD1677E:268b-26: de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo mtshon par byed pa ming gi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1677E:268b-27: de ltar dbang bskur ba'i phan yon ni /
T02TD1677E:268b-28: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02TD1677E:268b-29: mkha'i 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog kyang //
T02TD1677E:268b-30: rgyas mi thebs shing mi rmongs te //
T02TD1677E:268b-31: de la gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1677E:268b-33: de dam tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa sbyin par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1677E:268b-34: dang por mna' bsgag cing sdom pa sbyin pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad gsung dbyangs gcig pa'i sgo nas gsungs te /
T02TD1677E:268b-35: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02TD1677E:269a-2: ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02TD1677E:269a-3: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1677E:269a-4: lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang //
T02TD1677E:269a-5: de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po //
T02TD1677E:269a-6: de dag la ni snying ring sa nas //
T02TD1677E:269a-7: snying la khrag chen 'thung ba zhig / sems can khams ni ma lus don //
T02TD1677E:269a-8: srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD1677E:269a-9: mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1677E:269a-10: rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1677E:269a-11: rang gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing //
T02TD1677E:269a-12: dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya //
T02TD1677E:269a-13: ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad //
T02TD1677E:269a-14: 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin //
T02TD1677E:269a-15: rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la //
T02TD1677E:269a-16: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02TD1677E:269a-17: sdig med stobs kyis khyed ma 'jigs //
T02TD1677E:269a-19: zhes brjod cing sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig rnam pa gsum rgyas par bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:269a-20: des ni slob ma dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1677E:269a-21: de nas rdo rje slob dpon du bya zhing /
T02TD1677E:269a-22: bdag dang gzhan gyi don grub par 'dod pas bla ma la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD1677E:269a-23: mgon khyod thugs rje'i bka' drin gyis //
T02TD1677E:269a-24: dkyil 'khor slob dpon dbang bskur sogs //
T02TD1677E:269a-25: bdag gzhan don du bya ba rnams //
T02TD1677E:269a-26: 'grub byed dbang bskur bdag la stsol //
T02TD1677E:269a-29: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya che //
T02TD1677E:269a-30: zung shig yang dag gzung bar gyis //
T02TD1677E:269a-31: di ring rdo rje slob dpon che //
T02TD1677E:269a-32: slob ma'i tshogs rnams bsdu bar mdzod //
T02TD1677E:269a-33: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02TD1677E:269a-34: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na bsnams //
T02TD1677E:269a-35: rtag tu khyod kyis kyang gzung ste //
T02TD1677E:269a-36: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD1677E:269a-38: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra satva sa ma ya tishtha /
T02TD1677E:269a-39: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD1677E:269a-40: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02TD1677E:269a-41: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD1677E:269a-42: byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed /
T02TD1677E:269a-43: aom badzra ghande aa aesha tvam dha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi ho:/
T02TD1677E:269a-44: yid kyi lus ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1677E:269a-45: dam tshig phyag rgya zhes byar brjod //
T02TD1677E:269a-46: lus kun brtan byed gang zhig ni //
T02TD1677E:269a-47: phyag rgyar rab tu grags pa yin //
T02TD1677E:269a-48: aom ma h'a k'a ya w'ak tsitta badzra sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD1677E:269b-0: zhes brtul zhugs rnam pa gsum byin @269b nas ;
T02TD1677E:269b-2: bstod pa'i gar thabs kyis lha rnams mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:269b-3: de nas rjes su gang ba sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD1677E:269b-4: bdag gzhan don sgrub las kyi tshogs //
T02TD1677E:269b-5: thun mong 'bring po mchog gyur pa'i //
T02TD1677E:269b-6: zhi rgyas dbang drag dgug pa dang //
T02TD1677E:269b-7: sdang gnon rengs pa'i las kun dang //
T02TD1677E:269b-8: dbye rmongs bskrad pa'i cho ga rnams //
T02TD1677E:269b-9: thogs pa med par bsgrub par gyis //
T02TD1677E:269b-10: ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang //
T02TD1677E:269b-12: gsar 'gyur ril bu nyi zla gzung //
T02TD1677E:269b-13: char dbab la sogs las kyi tshogs //
T02TD1677E:269b-14: rnam shes sgrub dang ye shes sgrub ;
T02TD1677E:269b-15: / phyag rgya shes pa'i don sgrub dag / thams cad dngos grub 'gro ba yi //
T02TD1677E:269b-16: don nyid yang dag spyod par gyis //
T02TD1677E:269b-17: rgyal ba kun gyi gnas 'jug cing //
T02TD1677E:269b-18: sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan rgyan //
T02TD1677E:269b-19: phrin las bdag gzhan gnas sbyor ba'i //
T02TD1677E:269b-20: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dngos grub sgrub //
T02TD1677E:269b-22: de nas yang snga ma bzhin du mig dbye bar bya ste /
T02TD1677E:269b-23: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD1677E:269b-24: mig nad ling tog bsal ba ltar //
T02TD1677E:269b-25: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD1677E:269b-26: ling tog rgyal bas sel bar mdzad //
T02TD1677E:269b-27: aom badzra nee tra aa ba ha ra pa ta lam hr'i:/
T02TD1677E:269b-28: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD1677E:269b-29: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02TD1677E:269b-30: gzung 'dzin rnam bral brjod med du //
T02TD1677E:269b-31: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //
T02TD1677E:269b-32: rang bzhin med cing dag med pa //
T02TD1677E:269b-33: chos rnams de bzhin shes byas nas //
T02TD1677E:269b-34: sems can don ni yang dag byos //
T02TD1677E:269b-35: des na sangs rgyas sras su skye //
T02TD1677E:269b-36: zhes brjod de mig phye ba'i rjes la /
T02TD1677E:269b-37: chos thams cad kun rdzob sgyu ma lta bur snang ba la rjes su spyod par gnang ba'o //
T02TD1677E:269b-38: yang don dam pa dang yi dam gyi lha ji ltar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1677E:269b-39: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD1677E:269b-40: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02TD1677E:269b-41: nam mkha' dag dang mnyam sbyor bas ;
T02TD1677E:269b-42: / kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02TD1677E:269b-43: aom rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02TD1677E:269b-44: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD1677E:269b-45: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02TD1677E:269b-46: rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid gtso //
T02TD1677E:269b-48: de nyid kyi don bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:270a-0: yang lha mo bde mchog mas @270a * //
T02TD1677E:270a-1: byin gyis brlabs pa'i mda' gzhu byin te /
T02TD1677E:270a-2: phyogs bzhi dang steng 'og tu 'gengs shing 'phen pa'i tshul byas nas /
T02TD1677E:270a-3: chos kyi 'khor lo mas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gdan la 'dug ste /
T02TD1677E:270a-4: lag pa g-yas par dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i glegs bam sbyin zhing /
T02TD1677E:270a-5: g-yon par dung byin te sgra bsgrag par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:270a-6: aom pha rol phyin drug las rnams kyis //
T02TD1677E:270a-7: sems can don kun mnyam sbyor zhing //
T02TD1677E:270a-9: aom chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor //
T02TD1677E:270a-10: the tshom rtog tshogs gcod mdzad pa'i //
T02TD1677E:270a-11: chos kyi dung gi sgra bsgrags pas //
T02TD1677E:270a-12: gsang sngags gsang chen snying po'i don //
T02TD1677E:270a-13: snod ldan kun la rab tu shod //
T02TD1677E:270a-14: des ni rgyal ba thams cad la //
T02TD1677E:270a-15: phan 'dogs drin len mdzad pa yin //
T02TD1677E:270a-17: khyod la rtag tu bsrung bar mdzad ;
T02TD1677E:270a-19: de'i rjes la rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga bskor bar gnang ba sbyin pa ni //
T02TD1677E:270a-20: mdor na 'jig rten khams rnams su //
T02TD1677E:270a-21: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1677E:270a-22: ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs su //
T02TD1677E:270a-23: rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor du gsol //
T02TD1677E:270a-24: zhes rigs lnga'i gnas su sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:270a-25: da ni lung bstan pa las /
T02TD1677E:270a-26: dang po slob dpon gyis bsgo ba ni /
T02TD1677E:270a-27: 'di ltar nga yis khyod lung bstan //
T02TD1677E:270a-28: rdo rje dpal ldan gsang ba'i bdag / dngos po mchog tu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1677E:270a-29: srid pa'i ngan 'gro gnas las grol //
T02TD1677E:270a-30: kye che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa /
T02TD1677E:270a-32: de'i rjes la dus gsum gya rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang phyogs bcu nas gsung dbyangs mthun pa'i sgra skad kyis lung bstan par mdzad de /
T02TD1677E:270a-33: kye rigs kyi bu khyod kyi srid pa tha ma ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1677E:270a-34: gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa la zhugs pas phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02TD1677E:270a-35: gsang sngags kyi mthus rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1677E:270a-36: khyod kyis chags pa rnams pa gnyis dang 'bral bar mi bya ste /
T02TD1677E:270a-37: de dag gi las la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:270b-0: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig / khams gsum na ni gzhan @270b de ;
T02TD1677E:270b-1: / de bas 'dod la chags bral bar //
T02TD1677E:270b-2: khyod kyis nam yang bya ba min //
T02TD1677E:270b-3: ma h'a sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02TD1677E:270b-4: de ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon dang //
T02TD1677E:270b-6: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1677E:270b-7: lha rnams kun gyis mthun par gsungs//
T02TD1677E:270b-8: sems can kun la rjes brtse bar //
T02TD1677E:270b-9: dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bris //
T02TD1677E:270b-10: rtsi gcig nan tan bskyed nas ni //
T02TD1677E:270b-11: sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la sbyor //
T02TD1677E:270b-14: da ni dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir /
T02TD1677E:270b-15: dang po dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i phan yon brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:270b-17: zhugs shing mthong ba la sogs pas //
T02TD1677E:270b-18: sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing //
T02TD1677E:270b-19: khyed rnams rab tu dge bar gnas //
T02TD1677E:270b-21: de nas don bzhin du spyad pa'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1677E:270b-23: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02TD1677E:270b-24: phyi nas 'chi ba yang med cing //
T02TD1677E:270b-25: mtshungs med thub par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD1677E:270b-26: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02TD1677E:270b-27: srid pa shin tu dag pa nas //
T02TD1677E:270b-28: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las 'das so //
T02TD1677E:270b-29: da ni de dag gi dam tshig bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1677E:270b-30: byang chub sems ni yongs mi spang //
T02TD1677E:270b-31: rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya che //
T02TD1677E:270b-32: gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1677E:270b-33: sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med //
T02TD1677E:270b-34: dam pa'i chos dag mi smad cing //
T02TD1677E:270b-35: ma gus spang zhing dor mi bya //
T02TD1677E:270b-36: mi shes snod min rmongs pa la //
T02TD1677E:270b-37: nam yang bstan par mi bya'o //
T02TD1677E:270b-38: rdo rje dril bu mi spang ste //
T02TD1677E:270b-39: slob dpon dag la gus par gyis //
T02TD1677E:270b-40: zhes pa'i don bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:270b-41: de ltar slob dpon gyi dbang thob pa'i phan yon ni /
T02TD1677E:270b-42: khams gsum gyi ni rgyal srid che //
T02TD1677E:270b-43: bdag po rgyal chen dbang bskur zhing //
T02TD1677E:270b-44: bdud rnams thams cad las rgyal bar //
T02TD1677E:270b-45: grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin //
T02TD1677E:270b-47: sangs rgyas thob par the tshom med //
T02TD1677E:270b-48: dbang bskur rjes thob dbugs phyung bas //
T02TD1677E:270b-49: slob ma yon tan bdag por 'gyur //
T02TD1677E:270b-50: slob dpon bro gros dam tshig ldan //
T02TD1677E:270b-51: brtan g-yo'i mtha' las rnam par grol //
T02TD1677E:271a-2: / ngan pa'i gnas ngan kun spangs pa'o //
T02TD1677E:271a-4: de nas gdams ngag bstan pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang lha'i de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1677E:271a-5: de la dang po dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ni gru bzhi par gnas pas /
T02TD1677E:271a-6: che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyis rgyas par byas zhing sgo rnam pa bzhi yis byams pa dang /
T02TD1677E:271a-9: btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid can no //
T02TD1677E:271a-10: rta babs nas chos kyi 'khor lo'i bar du ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul du gnas pa ni byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du bgrod nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhir 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02TD1677E:271a-11: rin po che sna lnga'i rtsig pa las 'od kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga dang bcas pa 'phro ba ni /
T02TD1677E:271a-12: rang bzhin ye shes drug gi byin rlabs las rigs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs su snang ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1677E:271a-13: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ka ba brgyad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin la /
T02TD1677E:271a-14: rdo rje theg pa'i tshul gyis mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1677E:271a-17: me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa ni mdzad pa rgya chen po'i phrin las rnams yon tan las byung ba'i tshul lo //
T02TD1677E:271a-18: 'dod pa'i yon tan drug gi lha mo ni ;
T02TD1677E:271a-19: ; yul drug rnam par dag pa'i snang ba'o //
T02TD1677E:271a-20: gdugs snying rje chen po'i char khab dang /
T02TD1677E:271a-21: rgyal mtshan bdud rnam bzhi las rgyal zhing thog pa'i mchog ston pa'i mtshan ma dang /
T02TD1677E:271a-22: bla re mnyam pa nyid du tshul gcig par spyod pa'i tshul //
T02TD1677E:271a-23: rnga yab rnam par rtog pa'i sbrang ma sel bar mdzad pa dang /
T02TD1677E:271a-24: zla ba phyed pa rdo rjes smon lam rgya chen po 'gro ba'i don du theg pa chen po'i sngags kyi sgo nas don mdzad pa dang /
T02TD1677E:271a-25: rdo rje rin po che dbyig pa la ba dan dbyangs pas mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1677E:271a-26: de la dril bu sgra snyan pa phyogs bcur sgrogs pa ni theg pa sna tshogs kyi don ston pa'o //
T02TD1677E:271a-27: re'u cha brgyad kyi mtshan ma ni sku'i dbang phyug dang /
T02TD1677E:271a-29: thugs kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1677E:271a-30: thig bzhis legs par phye ba ni //
T02TD1677E:271b-1: sna tshogs padma'i mtshan ma dang /
T02TD1677E:271b-2: mu khyud rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba ni chags pa med pa'i phrin las kun du don spyad kyang nyon mongs pa'i mtshan mas ma gos shing bde ba chen po'i dbyings las sku gsung thugs kyi theg pa ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1677E:271b-3: bum pa rgyan gyis mdzes shing bdud rtsi'i bcud dang ldan pas che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas 'chi ba med pa'i bdud rtsi ye shes rnam pa lnga'i don las yon tan gyi snang ba ma 'gags shing 'dod pa'i longs spyod sna tshogs su 'phro ba'o //
T02TD1677E:271b-4: bar du re'u mig 'khor lo'i tshul du gnas pa ni phrin las dang mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur cing rang gi phyag rgya mdzes par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1677E:271b-5: phyi rol padma la sogs pa'i phreng ba dag ni chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i yon tan gyi snang bston pa dang /
T02TD1677E:271b-6: sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las dang bcas pa'i rnam pa dang /
T02TD1677E:271b-7: ye shes kyi byin rlabs kyis mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad sel bar mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1677E:271b-8: phyi rol gyi dur khrod chen po dag gis ni thams cad gsang sngags kyi theg par 'du zhing theg pa gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa'i tshul du khams gsum gyi zhen rtog spyang ba dang /
T02TD1677E:271b-9: phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga dag rnam par dag pa'i ngo bor bstan pa'o //
T02TD1677E:271b-10: zhing dang zhing skyong dag gis yon tan ma 'gags pa'i rten la sangs rgyas brgyad kyi snang ba ston pa'o //
T02TD1677E:271b-11: mtsho dang klu brgyad ni srid pa'i gnas kyi rtog pa'i tshogs dag gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi don ston pa'o //
T02TD1677E:271b-12: rnal 'byor pho mo dag gis ni dbyings dang ye shes zung du 'brel pa'i don gyis chos thams cad 'dus par bstan pa'o //
T02TD1677E:271b-13: sbrin dang mchod rten la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis ni thugs rje chen po'i sbrul pa'i 'phro 'du dang ye shes kyi snang ba brgyad bstan pa'o //
T02TD1677E:271b-14: bya khyi dang mkha' 'gro la sogs pa sna tshogs pas ni thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa dang /
T02TD1677E:271b-15: yon tan gyi rtsal ma 'gags pa'i phrin las gyi tshogs rnam par 'phro ba bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1677E:272a-0: de ltar rten gyi mtshan nyid rgya cher bstan nas brten pa'i rang bzhin dag shes par bya ba'i phyir dpal rdo rje sems @272a * //
T02TD1677E:272a-1: dpa' dkar dmar gyi mdangs dang ldan pas byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin la rtog pa'i mtshan mas ma gos shing thugs rje chen pos chags pa'i las mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1677E:272a-2: rin po che'i kha dog sna lnga'i 'od zer mdzes pas brgyan pa ni ye shes rnam pa lnga'i snang ba las rigs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs ston pa'o //
T02TD1677E:272a-4: phyag bzhi'i rnam pa can du byung bas phrin las rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02TD1677E:272a-5: tshad med bdag gi sgo nas 'gro ba dbugs 'byin pa'o //
T02TD1677E:272a-6: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis khams gsum las rgyal zhing /
T02TD1677E:272a-7: rang gi cha lugs bcom par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1677E:272a-8: phyag bzhi'i mtshon cha dag gis ye shes rnam pa lnga'i che ba las rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad pa dang /
T02TD1677E:272a-9: thugs rje chen pos rtse gcig tu /
T02TD1677E:272a-10: sems kyi las la dgongs pa dang /
T02TD1677E:272a-11: sku gsung thugs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas khams gsum las rgyal te ;
T02TD1677E:272a-12: gsang ba bla na med pa'i tshul ston pa dang /
T02TD1677E:272a-13: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel pa'i las kyis bskul ba dang /
T02TD1677E:272a-14: de'i mtshan nyid gzhan la ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1677E:272a-15: mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dag gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa'i tshul gyis mdzes shing byang chub sems kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rnam pa dang ma bral ba'i sgo nas stod g-yogs dang mdzad pa sna tshogs kyi las mnga' bas smad g-yogs kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1677E:272a-16: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /
T02TD1677E:272a-17: tshad med pa bzhi'i phrin las dag la spyod pas dpung pa rin po ches mdzes pa'o //
T02TD1677E:272a-18: gzhan yang rin po che'i ske rags dang /
T02TD1677E:272a-20: do shal gyis dge ba bcu dang /
T02TD1677E:272a-21: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /
T02TD1677E:272a-22: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
T02TD1677E:272a-23: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi don ston par byed pa'o //
T02TD1677E:272a-24: phyag dang zhabs la gdu bus mdzes shing se mo do bcus mtshan pa ni bden pa bzhi dang /
T02TD1677E:272a-25: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
T02TD1677E:272a-26: dge ba bcu yongs su rdzogs pa'i rtags so //
T02TD1677E:272a-27: dbu la rin po che'i rgyan dang /
T02TD1677E:272a-30: rigs kyi bdag po dag gis brgyan pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
T02TD1677E:272b-0: rigs kyi @272b mtshan mas lhag par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1677E:272b-1: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang /
T02TD1677E:272b-3: sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa ni phyag rgya bzhi'i sgo nas de nyid kyi don bstan par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD1677E:272b-4: phung po lnga rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1677E:272b-5: gzhan yang 'byung ba rnam pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas khyad par gyi phrin las bzhis 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi lha mo bzhi dang /
T02TD1677E:272b-6: skye mched la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa rnam par dag par mdzad cing rigs dang ye shes kyi snang ba yon tan gyi tshogs rnam par 'phrul pa las byung ba'i phrin las kyis gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir phrin las sna tshogs dang bcas par bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1677E:272b-7: dkyil 'khor so so'i lha rnams dag par bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:272b-8: de ltar rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas slob dpon gyi las su bya ba ni dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD1677E:272b-12: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa gzhan dag gi las bya ba rnams kyang rgya cher bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:272b-13: de nas lha dang slob dpon la ci 'byor pa'i yon gyis mchod cing rjes su yi rang dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:272b-14: des ni slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1677E:272b-15: da ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i skabs su dbang rdzogs par ma byas pa dang /
T02TD1677E:272b-16: gang zhig rdzogs pa dag gis gnas par 'dod na dben pa'i gnas su dris legs par byugs pa'i mantal la me tog la sogs pa bkram zhing bde ba'i stan brtsegs pa la bla ma bzhugs nas /
T02TD1677E:272b-17: shes rab ma mtshan dang ldan pa dag phul te /
T02TD1677E:272b-19: ston mo la sogs pa'i longs spyod kyis dgyes par byas nas /
T02TD1677E:272b-20: ras kyi yol ba la sogs pas bar bcad pa'i rgyab nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:272b-21: dpal ldan mgon po bde ba che //
T02TD1677E:272b-22: bde chen bde ba'i gnas la bzhugs //
T02TD1677E:272b-23: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02TD1677E:272b-24: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde stsol mdzod //
T02TD1677E:272b-25: byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyi //
T02TD1677E:272b-26: yang dag don mchog rnam dag pa //
T02TD1677E:272b-27: ji ltar de nyid bdud rtsi yi //
T02TD1677E:272b-28: mchog gi dbang ni bskur ba bzhin //
T02TD1677E:273a-2: sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar mdzod //
T02TD1677E:273a-3: rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri med mchog / ma rig rtog pa'i rab rib sel //
T02TD1677E:273a-4: gang gis byang chub bla med pa //
T02TD1677E:273a-5: de ring bdag gis thob par mdzod //
T02TD1677E:273a-7: de la slar yang smras nas /
T02TD1677E:273a-8: bu khyod ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin //
T02TD1677E:273a-9: rgyal ba kun gyi bde chen sbyin //
T02TD1677E:273a-10: ting 'dzin sbyor sngags gsal ba yis //
T02TD1677E:273a-11: rang gi gnas su legs par bstod //
T02TD1677E:273a-13: de nas phyi nang gi khrus byas te /
T02TD1677E:273a-14: dam tshig gi lha mo sbyangs nas sngags dang bcas pa'i yungs kar gyis bgegs bskrad cing sbyor ba dang /
T02TD1677E:273a-15: rjes su sbyor bas yab yum gnyis kyi sku bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:273a-17: byin gyis brlab pa dag rdzogs par byas nas rol pa'i brdas bskul zhing //
T02TD1677E:273a-18: sbro ba bskyed cing rigs kyi nga rgyal mnyam pa'i sgo nas gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i byang chub kyi sems slob ma'i lce la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:273a-19: ji ltar rgyal ba bde gshegs kyis //
T02TD1677E:273a-20: rang gi sras sogs dbang bskur bzhin //
T02TD1677E:273a-21: byang chub sems de dag pa'i chus //
T02TD1677E:273a-22: rnam rtog dri ma dag par bya //
T02TD1677E:273a-23: aom ma h'a bodhi tsitta sa ma ya aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD1677E:273a-25: slob mas kyang aa ho su kha zhes brjod cing mid de /
T02TD1677E:273a-26: rigs kyi cha lugs gsal bar chu'i zla ba'am sgyu ma'i rnam pa bzhin du gnas pa'o //
T02TD1677E:273a-27: des ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1677E:273a-28: yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa thob par 'dod pas rdo rje bla ma mchog tu gyur pa la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD1677E:273a-29: mandala dang mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rdo rje bla ma dang /
T02TD1677E:273a-30: phyag rgya mo mtshan dang ldan pa mnyes par byas nas /
T02TD1677E:273a-32: kye kye mgon po bde ba che //
T02TD1677E:273a-33: rdo rje sbyor las yang dag byung //
T02TD1677E:273a-34: phyag rgya mi phyed rab sgrub pa //
