T02TD1677E:273a-35: mngon sum nyams myong bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02TD1677E:273a-36: bdag nyid chen pos ji lta bar //
T02TD1677E:273a-37: gtso bos bdag la bka' drin mdzod //
T02TD1677E:273a-38: rtog pa'i dri mas bsgribs pa rnams //
T02TD1677E:273a-39: byang sems chu yis dag par mdzod //
T02TD1677E:273b-0: des kyang rigs dang mthun pa'i yum byin gyis brlabs la slob ma'i @273b lag tu gtad de /
T02TD1677E:273b-1: dga' ba'i gnas chen lha mo 'di //
T02TD1677E:273b-2: sna tshogs sgyu rtsal yid du 'ong //
T02TD1677E:273b-3: legs par zung shig blo gros can //
T02TD1677E:273b-4: dga' bde'i mchod pa rab tu gyis //
T02TD1677E:273b-5: thabs gzhan gyis ni 'tshang mi rgya //
T02TD1677E:273b-7: de bas khyod kyis 'di nyid dang //
T02TD1677E:273b-8: nam yang 'bral bar mi bya ste //
T02TD1677E:273b-9: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1677E:273b-10: rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med //
T02TD1677E:273b-11: blun po gang zhig 'di spong ba //
T02TD1677E:273b-12: de la mchog gi dngos grub med //
T02TD1677E:273b-14: de nas lha mos grogs la dga' ba'i bzhin gyis bltas te /
T02TD1677E:273b-15: 'dzum pa dang bcas par bha ga phye zhing bstan nas /
T02TD1677E:273b-16: khyod kyis nus sam rdo rje can //
T02TD1677E:273b-17: dri chen dri chu'i bza' btung dang //
T02TD1677E:273b-18: rakta ga pur m'am sa dang //
T02TD1677E:273b-19: bud med rnams la rtag gus dang //
T02TD1677E:273b-20: bha gar 'o byed mi rtog gam //
T02TD1677E:273b-21: smros shig grogs bo bde ba can //
T02TD1677E:273b-24: lha mo ci phyir bdag mi sbro //
T02TD1677E:273b-25: khu khrag la sogs za ba dang //
T02TD1677E:273b-26: bud med rnams la rtag gus shing //
T02TD1677E:273b-31: thams cad bde bar yang dag ldan //
T02TD1677E:273b-32: rtag tu rim bzhin 'di spyod na //
T02TD1677E:273b-33: de nyid bde chen 'bral mi gyur //
T02TD1677E:273b-34: chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag / sems can thams cad rnam par grol //
T02TD1677E:273b-35: bde chen rgyal po 'di nyid ni //
T02TD1677E:273b-36: dngos po kun gyi rang 'byung gnas //
T02TD1677E:273b-37: nang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo la //
T02TD1677E:273b-38: padma la bzhugs rab tu rgyas //
T02TD1677E:273b-39: bha ga'i mkha' dbyings nam mkha' bzhin //
T02TD1677E:273b-40: 'byung ba bzhi po rgyan bzhin bkod //
T02TD1677E:273b-41: lte ba'i ze'u 'bru ge sa ra zlum //
T02TD1677E:273b-43: de yi dbus su gnas pa ni //
T02TD1677E:273b-44: de nyid bdud rtsi chen po'i gzugs //
T02TD1677E:273b-47: de nas gnas dben par rgyan bzang po bris shing /
T02TD1677E:273b-48: dri zhim po'i chus gtor la stan bde ba la gnas te /
T02TD1677E:273b-49: khang pa'am yol ba la sogs pa gang yang rung bas bsgribs la /
T02TD1677E:273b-50: thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1677E:273b-51: rjes su sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1677E:274a-0: sbyor ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dag rim pa bzhin @274a * //
T02TD1677E:274a-2: de nas 'dod pa'i gtsug lag dang mthun par bde ba'i ye shes bskyed cing shis pa dang /
T02TD1677E:274a-3: mi shis pa'i mtshan ma dag yi ge lnga bcu'i gnas gang la bab pa'i sgo nas brtags te /
T02TD1677E:274a-4: ma ning gi yi ge dag la bab na ni slar bskyar bar bya'o ;
T02TD1677E:274a-5: / de ltar bde ba chen po'i don byang chub kyi sems phab nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis btung bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:274a-6: ye shes 'di ni shin tu phra //
T02TD1677E:274a-7: rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra zhing //
T02TD1677E:274a-8: rdul bral thar pa zhi ba'i mchog / rang gi rang bzhin de nyid do //
T02TD1677E:274a-10: de'i rjes la rdo rje slob dpon la yon phul te /
T02TD1677E:274a-12: dga' ba dang bcas bskor ba byas te /
T02TD1677E:274a-14: de nas dbang bzhi pa dag bla ma'i gdams ngag las byung ba bzhin du phyag rgya rnam gsum gang yang rung ba la brten te /
T02TD1677E:274a-15: rang gi nyams su myong bas me long gi dkyil 'khor bzhin du gnas pa la yun ring du gsal bar brtag go //
T02TD1677E:274a-16: des ni zag pa med pa'i ye shes bde ba chen po'i sku skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1677E:274a-18: rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyi //
T02TD1677E:274a-19: dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba //
T02TD1677E:274a-20: rin chen tshogs rnams thams cad kyis //
T02TD1677E:274a-21: rab tu mos par dbang bskur 'gyur //
T02TD1677E:274a-22: de nas khyad par gyi dam tshig bsgrag par bya ste /
T02TD1677E:274a-23: khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya //
T02TD1677E:274a-24: ma byin par yang blang bar bya //
T02TD1677E:274a-25: 'dod la log par g-yem par bya //
T02TD1677E:274a-26: brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya //
T02TD1677E:274a-27: rdo rje bla ma byang chub sems //
T02TD1677E:274a-28: srog gi phyir yang gtang mi bya ;
T02TD1677E:274a-29: / dran pa gsal bas gzung byas nas //
T02TD1677E:274a-30: lhag pa'i lha bzhin rin chen tog / ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:274a-31: de nas rdo rje slob dpon dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la mchod pa dang /
T02TD1677E:274a-33: yon gyi tshogs dbul zhing bskor ba byas te /
T02TD1677E:274a-35: bkra shis la sogs pa brjod nas mgron gyi tshogs rnams la gtor ma sbyin zhing dkyil 'khor bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:274b-0: de dag gis ni gnas skabs kyi bye brag mang bar 'jug pa'i don rnams phyogs gcig tu bsdus te bstan pa yin pas gang zag gi bye brag gis so so'i gnas skabs shes par bya @274b ste ;
T02TD1677E:274b-3: nang gi mtshas su cho ga ma nor ba'i sgo nas dbang bskur ba dang sgrub pa bsdebs pa ni lam gyi man ngag go //
T02TD1677E:274b-4: de dag ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1677E:274b-5: da ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa brtsam pa las dang po rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas zhi ba'i las la 'jug pa'i phyir /
T02TD1677E:274b-6: dkyil 'khor dang chags gos lnga dag bsgyur zhing zhi ba'i mchod pa dang /
T02TD1677E:274b-11: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa dang /
T02TD1677E:274b-12: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa dang /
T02TD1677E:274b-13: gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya bas mnyes par byas nas lha so so'i bzlas brjod kyis zhi ba'i las la sbyar zhing /
T02TD1677E:274b-20: dkyil 'khor bsdu ba rnams rim pa bzhin bya'o //
T02TD1677E:274b-23: las sna tshogs pa dag la yang so so'i rdzas dang /
T02TD1677E:274b-24: chas gos lnga dag bsgyur zhing dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1677E:274b-25: cho ga'i gzhung bsrang ba dang /
T02TD1677E:274b-26: bzlas brjod kyis so so'i las la sbyor ba dang /
T02TD1677E:274b-28: bskul ba la sogs pa'i las rnams rdzogs par byas nas /
T02TD1677E:274b-29: dkyil 'khor bsdu ba rnams rim pa bzhin du rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:274b-30: de ltar so so'i skabs su rdzas la brten pa'i las dag bsgrub cing /
T02TD1677E:274b-31: ci 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:274b-32: de nas sgrub pa po don la sbyor ba'i phyir snga ma las zhal bsgyur te /
T02TD1677E:274b-37: cha lugs kyi bye brag dag khro bo'i rnam pa dang mthun par dur khyod kyi chas brgyad kyis mtshon cing gnas te /
T02TD1677E:274b-40: las kyi rdo rjes rang gi las la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:274b-44: dngos grub kyi phyag rgya dag dgram zhing byin bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:275a-2: yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
T02TD1677E:275a-3: spyan drang ba la sogs pa'i tshogs nmyes par bya ba dang /
T02TD1677E:275a-4: bzlas brjod kyi rnam pa gsal bar byas nas dbyangs drug gis bskul ba dang /
T02TD1677E:275a-9: lhag pa'i las rnams rdzogs par byas nas /
T02TD1677E:275a-10: de ltar dkyil 'khor drug gi bzlas brjod kyi rim ba ni zhag gcig la nyin mtshan dus drug tu bcad de /
T02TD1677E:275a-11: thun mong dang khyad par gyi bzlas pa dag rab 'bring bsdus rgyas kyis brtsam zhing thog ma'i dus su ni bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1677E:275a-12: bzlas pa'i yan lag rdzogs par byas nas thun tha ma gnyis la ni kun du bzang po'i mchod pa nas brtsams te mthar rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:275a-13: de yang bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa'i dus su bzlas pa'i grangs mnyam par ji srid mtshan ma'i rtags ma gsal gyi bar du brtsam zhing /
T02TD1677E:275a-14: nye ba'i bsnyen pa dag la ni ji ltar 'tsham par thun mong gi bsnyen pa las bzhi'i sgo nas bskul ba dang /
T02TD1677E:275a-15: khyad par du lha so so'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:275a-16: sgrub pa'i dus su yang bzlas pa gnyis rdzogs par gyur nas /
T02TD1677E:275a-17: las bzhi'i bskul bas mthar dbyung ngo //
T02TD1677E:275a-18: de nas mtshan gcig gi cho gas sgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya ste /
T02TD1677E:275a-19: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dran par byas nas //
T02TD1677E:275a-20: de nas gnyis su med pa'i tshul du sbyor ba'i byang chub kyi sems bsdus te /
T02TD1677E:275a-21: dbang po lnga la thig le bya'o //
T02TD1677E:275a-22: de dag ni thams cad dag pa'i sbyor bas bdag nyid lus la dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1677E:275a-23: de nas dkyil 'khor drug gi sbyor bas rim pa bzhin yi ge gcig pa'i sngags brjod cing /
T02TD1677E:275a-24: las thams cad dngos grub du bya ba dang /
T02TD1677E:275a-25: dngos grub thams cad dbang du bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1677E:275a-26: phyag rgya rim pa bzhin du bcings te /
T02TD1677E:275a-27: rnam shes kyi phyag rgya shes pa la sogs pas brtags nas /
T02TD1677E:275a-28: so so'i mtshan ma dag so so'i phyag rgya dang sbyor bas dbab cing dbyangs drug bro gar dang bcas pas dngos grub kyi stsol byang bya ste /
T02TD1677E:275b-0: mchod cing bstod nas mtshan ltas byung ba'i @275b dus su dngos grub gang yin pa'i sgo nas blangs te /
T02TD1677E:275b-2: de'i dus su phan gnod byed pa'i mtshan mngon shes par byas nas re dogs med pa'i sems kyis dngos grub blang ba dang /
T02TD1677E:275b-3: bgegs bzlog pa'i cho ga dag brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:275b-4: gal te ma grub bam mi gsal na zhi ba dang /
T02TD1677E:275b-9: bzlas pa'i cho gas bsgrub par bya ba'am /
T02TD1677E:275b-10: sbyin sreg gis shis par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:275b-11: skabs skabs su mtshams kyi cho ga dang /
T02TD1677E:275b-12: dri chab la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02TD1677E:275b-15: bskang bshags rnams ni las kyi rdo rjes bya'o //
T02TD1677E:275b-16: de nas sgrub pa chen po mthar phyin nas dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ma bskor zhing 'di dang phyi mar mi 'brlas ba'i smon lam gdab bo //
T02TD1677E:275b-17: yang rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa la sogs pas lhag chad bskang zhing bshags byang byas nas bkra shis brjod cing dngos grub kyi lhag ma blangs te rnal 'byor pas longs spyod do //
T02TD1677E:275b-18: slar yang mchod pa'i tshogs rnams lha dang /
T02TD1677E:275b-19: bla ma la phul te bstod pa byas nas //
T02TD1677E:275b-20: bro gar dang rdo rje'i glus dgyes par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:275b-21: de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bton nas mdun du bzhag ste /
T02TD1677E:275b-23: bkra shis brjod cing gshegs su gsol zhing /
T02TD1677E:275b-24: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin bsdus nas gzugs brnyan gyi rdzas rnams dang /
T02TD1677E:275b-25: tshon rtsi dag bstsus te gsang ba'i gnas su dngos grub kyi rdzas su gzhag go //
T02TD1677E:275b-26: yang na chu bo chen por rol mo dang bcas pas gshegs so //
T02TD1677E:275b-27: de'i rjes la rdzas dang mantal legs par dag pa'i cho gas bya ba gzhan gyis ma mthong bar bya'o //
T02TD1677E:275b-28: yang khro bo bcu las mchod cing bstod de /
T02TD1677E:275b-29: phur ba bsdus la cod pan bkrol zhing khrus byas nas brda dang mtshams dgrol par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:275b-30: de nas gtor ma rgya chen po bshams te /
T02TD1677E:275b-31: mgron tshogs rnams bsdus la bsngos nas mnyes pas las la gzhag go //
T02TD1677E:275b-32: yang khyad par gyi srung ma dag la bsngos te /
T02TD1677E:275b-33: rten la gzhag pa'i rgyal po bzhi dang /
T02TD1677E:276a-0: phur bus btab pa'i phyogs skyong rnams mnyes nas @276a * //
T02TD1677E:276a-1: rang gi gnas su gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1677E:276a-2: de nas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bkra shis brjod cing bkra shis 'don pa dang /
T02TD1677E:276a-4: 'gro ba'i don du smon lam gdab pa dang /
T02TD1677E:276a-5: spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor ma nyams par bya'o //
T02TD1677E:276a-6: dang po'i rnal 'byor snga ma'i rim bzhin bka' //
T02TD1677E:276a-7: legs bstan rjes mthun dam pas gsal byas gang //
T02TD1677E:276a-8: de don sgrub rim snga ma'i gzhung nyid bzhin //
T02TD1677E:276a-9: khyad par lhag pa cung zhig brjod pa med //
T02TD1677E:276a-10: 'on kyang go rims mi gsal legs bsdebs pas //
T02TD1677E:276a-11: dang po gang du bdag pas dman sogs rnams //
T02TD1677E:276a-12: tshegs med sla bas las chen bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1677E:276a-13: sgrub pa'i rim pa gus pas blang bar mdzod //
T02TD1677E:276a-14: tshe 'dis phyag rgya chen po'i lam bsgrub phyir //
T02TD1677E:276a-15: de yi cho ga dri med legs bshad pa //
T02TD1677E:276a-16: dga' mdzes pad dkar yid 'ong tshogs rgyas la//
T02TD1677E:276a-17: de 'dod bstan pa'i don thob tshim bzhin shog / dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rim pa dang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po h'um mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1677E:276a-19: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po birya ka ra sidha dang /
T02TD1677E:276a-20: bod kyi lo ts'a ba lha rin po ches bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o//
